bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性４連ダメージ
bb.name: エストレアルブレイド

dictionary.description: A swordswoman from the ruined Sama Kingdom, she later became one of the Six Heroes. Born from a line of chiefs of the wandering sea people of Savat, she was raised in traditional long sword techniques. She stood out so much that she was offered the treasured sword Lexida as proof of her chiefdom at age 14. She refused it at the time, claiming she was inexperienced.
dictionary.fusion:
I don't really need
to get any stronger...
dictionary.summon:
You're a Summoner?
Alright then, I'll stick
with you for now.

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 水神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: ディヴァインヘイル

dictionary.description: A swordswoman from the ruined Sama Kingdom, she later became one of the Six Heroes. At 18, she folded to the pressure around her and took up the treasured sword Lexida as proof of her chiefdom. She had always rejected the sword, but it was a good fit for her quick and ice cold style. Those who faced her are said to have felt a freezing cold before battle.
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel it growing stronger...
My connection with the treasured sword, Lexida.
dictionary.summon:
You need me, huh?
You seem quite suitable,
let me show you my power!

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 水神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性７連ダメージ
bb.name: ブリザードペイン

dictionary.description: A swordswoman from the ruined Sama Kingdom, she later became one of the Six Heroes. During a civil war in the Sama Kingdom, she aided the king and as chief of the Savat people, led them to many military victories. The king granted her the title Gilles De Lava, meaning savior of the kingdom. The Savat were pleased, but i'ts rumored she was always looking for a reason to quit.
dictionary.evolution:
If it helps my people,
I will gladly wield this sword!
dictionary.fusion:
I can hear them calling...
I need to become stronger...
dictionary.summon:
How'd you summon me?
You must be pretty strong.
I'll lend you my power.

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 水創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: コキュートス・ゼロ

dictionary.description: A swordswoman from the ruined Sama Kingdom. She is the savior of her kingdom, and one of the six heroes. During the great war she refused Sama Kingdom's call and led the Savat people to save the masses. Her sword, Lexida, showed its true power in response to her skill, cutting down the gods with a cold pale blue strike. She gave the people courage and terrified the gods.
dictionary.evolution:
I do not fear the gods!
Watch as Lexida puts them
in their place!
dictionary.fusion:
Watch this!
Lexida, lend me your strength!
dictionary.summon:
I was actually summoned!?
Amazing! Now, let me show you
the power of my Lexida!

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 水創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: ラストブリザード

dictionary.description: A swordswoman from the ruined Sama Kingdom. She is the savior of her kingdom, and one of the Six Heroes. The Savat people she led all lost their lives in the great war. As the last one standing, she tried to end her life, but a voice from her sword Lexida halted her. It was the voices of her fallen countrymen. With her allies' souls in her sword, she fought with more strength and beauty than ever before.
dictionary.evolution:
Spirits residing within my Lexida!
Once again, lend me your power!
The power to destroy the gods!
dictionary.fusion:
Don't worry, I'm here.
Fight with all you have
until the sword in your heart breaks.
dictionary.summon:
You who have summoned me.
I'm not easy to command.
Don't say I didn't warn you!

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ・最大ＨＰを１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 水鏡神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰをかなり回復
sbb.name: エストレアルキャリバー

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１２連ダメージ
bb.name: スペリオルジェリッド

dictionary.description: After losing the people she had led onto the battlefield, Selena sought to stop the God Army. On her way there, she suffered an assault by a religious fanatic witch, though she was able to escape thanks to the sacrifice her close friend Lucina had made. Selena attained powers greater than those of the gods during this battle, but immediately after a knight appeared before her and spoke. Answering that "even so, I will never forgive you," she was struck down by the knight while she stared him down. The people who managed to survive after her death stopped retaliating and went on to seek a new home.
dictionary.evolution:
People always have others supporting them.
If we realize that, we may win
even against the gods.
dictionary.fusion:
Within me exists anger,
sadness, and happiness...
They shall all be my power, and my blade.
dictionary.summon:
I had always wanted to live freely.
Hey, tell me something.
Do you think I led a free life?

extra skill.desc: 「宝剣レクシーダ」を装備時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆ＨＰが２０％以下の時、一度だけ戦闘不能を耐える
extra skill.name: 絆を背負いし者

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を１００％アップ・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 水麗神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを大回復
sbb.name: ルゼルエンティオス

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な水属性２５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを全回復・通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数をかなり増加
ubb.name: シロキセカイ

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性４連ダメージ＆高確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: レイジングニードル

dictionary.description: A dragon rider from the ruined Sama Kingdom. He trained under his father and became a dragon rider at the young age of 14. His ability to ride marine and aerial dragons made him a promising candidate for commander. He was deeply loyal and accepted orders from his king unconditionally, but that inflexibility eventually led to his downfall.
dictionary.fusion:
I want my power back.
I wonder, will I ever return
to my former self?
dictionary.summon:
You want to know why
dragon riders wield spears?
Let me show you!

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性５連ダメージ＆高確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: レイジングバレット

dictionary.description: A dragon rider from the ruined Sama Kingdom. His hopes of becoming the next dragon knight commander were lost when he mistakingly took orders which he thought were from the king. Even under house arrest, his loyalty didn't falter. Instead, he continued to hone his skills. He was known as the Ice Dragon Knight, wielding his spear made from his kingdom's unique ice.
dictionary.evolution:
The Ice Dragon Knight
offers you his spear...
Use it wisely.
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel it flowing inside me.
My time to return is near!
dictionary.summon:
What need have you
for my insufficient power?
Some Summoner you are...

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の煌めき

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性６連ダメージ＆高確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: レイジンググローリー

dictionary.description: A dragon rider from the ruined Sama Kingdom. He had been under house arrest, but returned to the dragon rider corps when the gods invaded. He had a lust for killing as a way of venting his anger. He earned respect and the title of the Ice Dragon King. He was still loyal to the royal family, and when the gods attacked, he offered himself to protect them.
dictionary.evolution:
I have returned to power!
Now I will slice open a path
to the future with my spear!
dictionary.fusion:
My spear and dragon are overjoyed!
Is this the true power
of a Summoner?!
dictionary.summon:
Show me your worth.
Prove to me you are necessary
and you will live.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の閃光

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性８連ダメージ＆高確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: レイジングストーム

dictionary.description: A dragon rider from the ruined Sama Kingdom. When the gods invaded, he stood up to protect the royal family, suffering a fatal wound in the process. On the brink of blacking out, he felt his and his beloved dragon's souls fuse as one. When he woke up, he felt his dragon's powers stirring in his human body. His dragon, however, lay beside him, unmoving.
dictionary.evolution:
I and my sorrow are eternal!
It is proof that my beloved
dragon still lives on!
dictionary.fusion:
This unlimited strength stirring within me
is proof that dragons are the strongest!
dictionary.summon:
How do I look to you?
Like a human, or a dragon?
Pfft, not like that matters now anyway.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の閃光

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性１３連ダメージ＆高確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: レイジングヘイル

dictionary.description: A dragoon who protected the royal family of the Sama Kingdom until the very end during the great war with the gods. Zephu, who continued to fight even after having rescued Prince Arius, fought so arduously that both his soul and his body began fusing with those of his dragon. His beloved lance went through the same transformation, and under the new name "Ice Dragon," became an extension of Zephu's own body. However, Zephu knew that the more he strained both his mind and body, the closer it would bring him to his death.
dictionary.evolution:
I'm neither a human, nor a dragon.
I am both human and dragon.
Do you understand that?
dictionary.fusion:
In my current state,
I can muster unlimited power.
If my body can take it, that is...
dictionary.summon:
I am a knight.
Once I pledge myself to you,
I shall follow you to the end.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを７５％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の神光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１６連ダメージ＆確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
sbb.name: ドラゴンブリザード

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 噛みつきアイジング

dictionary.description: A demon born from drops at the bottom of a giant waterfall. They are weak and the lowest ranked of all monsters. They exhibit pack behavior and like watery places, but are cowardly and usually run from humans. However, some of them are violent and attack by attaching themselves to an enemy's head. Rumor is they're not suitable for drinking, but no one has ever tested this theory.
dictionary.fusion:
*Splish* *Splosh*
My body is damp!
dictionary.summon:
Take me with you!
If you get thirsty you can
have a drink of me.

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性２連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 丸かじりアイジング

dictionary.description: Water Slime is said to evolve into Water Slime King after climbing the waterfall under which it was born. Unlike Water Slime, it likes fighting, yet the clear water that it enjoys drinking limits this habitat. If one is careful, it is possible to avoid an encounter with Water Slime King. Considerably more powerful than Water Slime, the flood of water it spews is mighty enough to drown someone even on land.
dictionary.evolution:
Watch me grow! *Splosh*
I'll blast 'em with a jet of
water! *Splosh*
dictionary.fusion:
My body is is so damp! *Drip*
I want more water! *Drop*
dictionary.summon:
*Drip* I'll go with you!
Promise I'll do my best!
*Splash*

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 水の護り

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性６連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 食べ尽くしアイジング

dictionary.description: The Kaiser Squirty was first discovered under a serene waterfall found in Ishgria. The location of the Kaiser Squirty's core, which it uses to store water, changes according to the purity of the water itself. Luckily, this creature is fairly easy to find, as it leaves a trail of rainbows wherever it passes through. Angering it could prove extremely dangerous though, since the Kaiser Squirty releases its rage by freezing everything in its surroundings within a matter of seconds. Because of this, it has also been dubbed "the ice demon pearl."
dictionary.evolution:
You say you're thirsty? *Splish*
Then you should drink some of
the water on my back! *Splosh*
dictionary.fusion:
It tastes okay, I guess. *Splish*
But next time you should feed me
more things rich in liquid! *Splosh*
dictionary.summon:
I feel like the tiniest strike
will make me burst! *Splish*
Take good care of me, okay? *Splosh*

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を１５％アップ＆水属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 水神の天冠

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: キュアリング

dictionary.description: A monk from the ruined Sama Kingdom. Much of the kingdom had contact with the sea, so many worshiped the sea god, Salam. From a young age, Merith was also deeply moved by those teachings. She endeavored to become a monk at an early age, formally becoming one at 16. The monks of the Sama Kingdom acquired healing powers to protect the people, and are most accustomed to water magic.
dictionary.fusion:
Faith is my strength.
Would you pray with me?
dictionary.summon:
I'm Merith, the monk.
I look forward to travelling
with you.

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 水の護り

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: キュアライト

dictionary.description: A great monk from the church of the water god, Salam, in the ruined Sama Kingdom. Putting dogma first led to harsh criticism, but she stuck steadfast to her principles. Always treating people fair regardless of their position led to many supporting her. She was popular and her magic was strong. She saved countless, rich and poor, with her healing magic.
dictionary.evolution:
God of water, Salam!
What do you wish of me?
dictionary.fusion:
Throw out doubt and believe.
Everything starts from there.
dictionary.summon:
I've been waiting for you.
Call me Merith.
Please make use of my magic.

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 水の護り

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: キュアストーム

dictionary.description: A great monk from the ruined Sama Kingdom that once prayed to the water god, Saram. After the war with the gods began, she was torn as to what she should do as she had previously served them. In the end, she went to the front lines and used her healing magic to save people. Without fighting against the gods, she saved the people who were hurt. That was probably as far as she could go in resisting the gods.
dictionary.evolution:
My actions are in
defience of the gods.
Even so, I...
dictionary.fusion:
Great power is necessary,
but knowing how to use it
is even more important.
dictionary.summon:
Thank you for summoning me.
I will repay you by sharing
the gospel of Saram with you.

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 水の護り

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性４連ダメージ＆高確率で病気状態にする
bb.name: スパイラルランス

dictionary.description: A magical aquatic being that lives in the oceans of Grand Gaia. They are often found in the tales of humans. They usually live in the sea or on the shore, but they are found anywhere where there is water, including rivers and lakes. A human can easily run into one. They move in groups and are observed to be very dangerous when hunting larger beasts.
dictionary.fusion:
Kishashashasha!
You now understand how strong I've gotten.
dictionary.summon:
Kishashasha!
I like you.
I'll join you.

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性６連ダメージ＆高確率で病気状態にする
bb.name: ダンシングチャージ

dictionary.description: When a merman's inherent water magic awakens, it evolves into a Sahuagin. Its shape is perfect for moving in water. Its lower half changes from two legs into a tail fin. Crueler than mermen, they often attack ships looking for human blood. Rumor is that there is treasure where Sahuagins live, but none of the adventurers that dove down to check have ever returned.
dictionary.evolution:
*Gargle* I can feel it!
The need for human blood!
dictionary.fusion:
*Gargle* *Gargle*
I will skewer them with my lance!
dictionary.summon:
*G-Gargle*
You're different.
Take me with you.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性７連ダメージ＆高確率で病気状態にする
bb.name: フリーズランサー

dictionary.description: An evolved Sahuagin which, like them, attacks ships for their treasure. Their organization is larger than some kingdoms, and it's said there are even some among them who understand human languages. It seems they sometimes appear in human settlements looking to trade hard to find items for treasure. Lizard Men are known for their superior group battle techniques, and it seems some even favor militarization over treasure.
dictionary.evolution:
Let's make a deal, human.
In exchange for my servitude,
grant me your human knowledge.
dictionary.fusion:
What is this technique?
How great it is to have strength!
I must inform the king!
dictionary.summon:
You're not a normal human.
Your power greatly interests me.
Take me with you.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性２連ダメージ＆高確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: クレイジースラッシュ

dictionary.description: A novice pirate active in the seas near the ruined Sama Kingdom. From his relaxed appearance and speech, he was often made light of by enemies who would soon regret it. With deceivingly quick movements and a hearty strike, he would cut down opponents in a flash. In his day, his captain would always say, "As long as there be scum around, there be wine to drink."
dictionary.fusion:
Yo ho! Fusion time!
Time to power up!
dictionary.summon:
I am a pirate!
A pirate's life for me!
Yo ho, I'll tag along with you!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＨＣ出現率を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 心の輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性４連ダメージ＆高確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: マキシマムヴァイス

dictionary.description: A pirate captain active in the seas near the ruined Sama Kingdom. His huge body and handsome beard awed those who stood before him. He spoke much softer than he looked, and his navigation log states that he maintained a peaceful ship. However, he was a demon in battle. He was so strong that whole navies would flee when they saw his flag.
dictionary.evolution:
Even as captain, I am me!
I'll cut foes in half while I sing and dance!
dictionary.fusion:
I am a pirate captain!
Behold, my burly strength!
dictionary.summon:
Freedom is the pirate's motto!
I'm free to help you, too!
On we go to treasure isle!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＨＣ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 心の煌めき

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性６連ダメージ＆高確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: ポセイドンアックス

dictionary.description: A pirate commander that led a group of pirates in the seas near the ruined Sama Kingdom. Though he lived much of his life carefree and without aim, once he started caring for Mega, the boy who would come to be known as the Commander, he began gathering pirates from all around. Taking lead over most of the other pirates around him, Verica came to be known as the Sea Prince. However, he seemed much more focused on the development of the child Mega.
dictionary.evolution:
Changing, faster than ever!
From captain to sea royalty!
Or maybe to a loving father!
dictionary.fusion:
Who's my strength for?
Why it's for you, my treasure!
That's why I must get stronger!
dictionary.summon:
Do you know what I want?
I, as Sea Prince, will conquer
the seas for him!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＨＣ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 心の煌めき

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性２連ダメージ＆高確率で毒状態にする
bb.name: スネークリッパー

dictionary.description: Magic beings that are half woman, half snake. It is rumored their bodies attract men lost at sea. When a man gets close, their snake tail grabs them and drags them to the ocean floor. Captured men are said to become Ramia's food or slaves, but since none have ever returned, it's unclear which is true. They are dangerous, but many men still wish to see one just once.
dictionary.fusion:
Oh, is this a tribute to me?
So sweet, now how should I
reward you?
dictionary.summon:
Don't I look good?
Take me with you and I
promise to treat you right.

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性４連ダメージ＆高確率で毒状態にする
bb.name: コールドトーチャー

dictionary.description: A magical being from legends of sailors whose top half is a beautiful woman and bottom half is multiple snakes.More powerful Ramia, sailors often tell stories of how ships prepped to exterminate them were sunk as soon as they set sail. There is a tale that says she was a queen cursed by a sea witch due to a grudge.
dictionary.evolution:
Love and hate are two sides of the same coin.
Will you let me love you?
dictionary.fusion:
You know what I like!
Come in, I'll treat you right!
dictionary.summon:
You're cute, aren't you...
Take me with you and let my
claws can do the talking!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、カルマ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 魂の輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性８連ダメージ＆高確率で毒状態にする
bb.name: サーペントクリーヴ

dictionary.description: A demon with the upper body of a beautiful goddess, and a lower body composed of multiple sea serpents. Referred to as the "Queen of the Sea Demons," she calls legions of demons to do her bidding by singing an alluring song from the bottom of the ocean. However, no one has returned to land from an attack by this sea serpent queen, so the truth is still shrouded in mystery. Some stories tell of a witch who went mad after the Sea God did not return her affections, and it is believed that this is the true identity of Lotan.
dictionary.evolution:
It's okay if he doesn't love me.
I'm fine with him hating me!
Because he won't forget me.
dictionary.fusion:
Huh?
Are you trying to charm me
by doing this?
dictionary.summon:
Did you call me?
You don't have to be shy.
I'll be with you till the very end.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、カルマ出現率をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 魂の煌めき

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復
bb.name: リキュアライズ

dictionary.description: A giant, deep-sea beast with ten tentacles. It's said to be the sea god incarnate, manifested to punish polluters of the sea. Though said to attack and destroy ships, it would also occasionally show it's god-like side by clensing the seas. Either way, ships always have offerings ready to ease Rantoul's wrath.
dictionary.fusion:
The sea's strength is the strength of Mother Nature.
Yield to it's currents.
dictionary.summon:
There's a pureness about you.
Help me punish those who deface
Mother Nature!

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰ少しを回復
bb.name: 生命の息吹

dictionary.description: A species of water drake that lives in Grand Gaia's oceans. There are some regions that worship it due to its huge form. Like Rantoul, it is said to be an incarnation of a powerful sea god. It's said to be responsible for keeping the oceans clean. Its powers are much greater than Rantoul's, and sea voyagers always make offerings to it before setting sail.
dictionary.evolution:
Cleaning the oceans is my duty.
What is yours?
dictionary.fusion:
Do you have an offering for me?
If so, I must repay you somehow...
dictionary.summon:
Your ambition is admirable.
I will help you to cross
the oceans safely.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＨＣ出現率を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 心の輝き

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復
bb.name: 再生の帝水

dictionary.description: A water dragon that is said to have appeared only to cleanse the sea after it had been polluted. The clean water that poured from its body was said to have the power to heal all kinds of sicknesses. However, with every appearance it made its body grew weak and its life short. The main theory is that this was due to the toxins that had built up in its body, though others say it was because of its continuous fighting against the source of the sea pollution.
dictionary.evolution:
This isn't just water.
It has the power to
cleanse the world.
dictionary.fusion:
Pure hearted Summoner.
I will receive this power
you've bestowed to me.
dictionary.summon:
It's useless to cleanse something
without attacking the impurity's source.
Let end the cause of this evil.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＨＣ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 心の煌めき

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、防御力を少しアップ・クリティカル率を少しアップ
bb.name: プリズムシャワー

dictionary.description: A beautiful, high-ranked water spirit that lives in lakes. A spirit born to defend her own lake, she won't move from the lake she's born in. However, if she falls in love, she may leave her lake and pledge to go with her lover. She has a fiery and loving personality, but since her appearance suddenly changes when betrayed, men fear meeting with her.
dictionary.fusion:
My power is increasing...
This feeling, it's got to be...
dictionary.summon:
I am Undine.
Let's go together.
Leave the water magic to me!

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 水の護り

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、防御力を少しアップ・クリティカル率を少しアップ
bb.name: ミラクルシャワー

dictionary.description:
A beautiful, high-ranked water spirit that lives in oceans. She has strong magical power, excelling in water magic.
When the power of Undine increases, it grows wings and can freely fly to all waters. Love is her magic's source,
and she showers unlimited affection on their lovers. However, she bares her fangs towards their lover's enemies.
dictionary.evolution:
Your love changed me.
I will be your strength.
dictionary.fusion:
This is your love.
Power rises from it like a fountain...
dictionary.summon:
Will you take me along?
I'm so happy.
I offer you my heart.

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 水の護り

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、防御力をアップ・クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: プラネットシャワー

dictionary.description: A high-ranked spirit that rules over all water. Even in places with small amounts of water, she moves freely through the air. It's said that when a rainbow filled the sky she would appear dancing above. It's thought that anyone who sees her is lucky, and many have reached toward the skies trying to catch her. She doesn't like this, however, and should anyone try to touch her she encases everything in water with a cold look on her face.
dictionary.evolution:
You can actually see me?
He he he. Well then, why
don't you come a little closer?
dictionary.fusion:
Huh? What could this be?
Oh, I see. You're a bad seed,
aren't you?
dictionary.summon:
Won't you dance with me?
Why, you ask? He he he.
Won't know 'til you try!

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 水の結界

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、防御力をかなりアップ・クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: エリクシールシャワー

dictionary.description: A spirit enveloped by love who sublimated into a higher form of existence. Rumor has it that she once searched for love desperately, which kept her from transcending her state as a mere water spirit. However, after many long years of studying love, she finally came to understand its true meaning. It was thanks to this enlightening that she ascended to her goddess status before she even realized it. And even now, she continues to pour her endless love into every corner of the world.
dictionary.evolution:
Look!
You gave me so much love that
I am now able to love for myself!
dictionary.fusion:
I will gladly accept your love!
And I shall reciprocate that love as well.
dictionary.summon:
Don't worry.
I shall love you!
You have nothing to fear.

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減＆全てのユニットの防御力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 水創神の結界

sbb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力をかなりアップ・クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
sbb.name: メルティスプライト

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性５連ダメージ＆高確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: 覇凍連撃

dictionary.description: A knight from the ruined Sama Kingdom. Sergio was isolated as a heretic for secretly training by himself in the Cavalry Corps, whose aim was group combat. However, his skills far surpassed the others, and he was reluctantly made the leader of a commando unit. His own unit feared him, and called him the Ice Knight after the cold way he cuts down his enemies.
dictionary.fusion:
What does power mean
to you??
Show me your answer in combat.
dictionary.summon:
So you need my blade?
Hmm, alright.
Stay behind me. I'll defend you.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 猛者の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性７連ダメージ＆高確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: 帝王氷刹刃

dictionary.description: A knight from the ruined Sama Kingdom. He was the commander of a Sama Kingdom Cavalry commando unit, but left to face the gods alone when the war began. Some admired him and tried to join, but Sergio refused them. He was always aloof even while being admired by people for his battles with the gods. At some point, he earned the title Ice Ruler.
dictionary.evolution:
I don't need any allies.
I'm fine as long as there are enemies to slay.
dictionary.fusion:
Can I grow even stronger?
Is that your answer?
dictionary.summon:
People call me the Ice Ruler
You want me to join you?
Interesting. This should be fun.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 王者の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性８連ダメージ＆高確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: 砕覇裂氷撃

dictionary.description: A knight from the ruined Sama Kingdom. Injured in the fight against the gods, he collapsed and was prepared to die. But as the final strike came, his troops rushed forward to protect him. Though he refused to befriend them, many of them admired his indifference. Watching them, Sergio found the strength to swing his sword of ice to protect the people.
dictionary.evolution:
Strength comes from solitude.
Why then did I fail to find power
in my isolation?
dictionary.fusion:
To be strengthened by one whom I thought of as a burden…
Such irony.
dictionary.summon:
What kind of strength can you give me?
Will that be worth a swing of my sword?

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性１５連ダメージ＆高確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: 翼氷輝神撃

dictionary.description: A knight from the Sama Kingdom. Having attained his powers in order to protect others, Sergio's prowess was acknowledged by the prince, who entrusted him with crucial strategic plans. In turn, Sergio also acknowledged the prince's progress, which led them to develop a deep bond of friendship and trust on the battlefield. At the sight of imminent defeat at the hands of the God Army, Sergio was sent to the battlefield under the prince's command. Thanks to his actions, the Sama Army was able to avoid destruction, though after that small victory Sergio was never heard from again.
dictionary.evolution:
Trust, bonds, friendship, love...
The strength that grows from them
is the last thing I learned.
dictionary.fusion:
This power you have given me
must surely be to protect you.
That is why I am here.
dictionary.summon:
I will watch your back.
I will slay anyone
who dare stands in your path!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ＆炎属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 炎神の威光

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な水属性１７連ダメージ＆高確率で弱体状態にする＆自分のＢＢゲージを満タンにする
sbb.name: ダイヤモンドゼロ

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性４連ダメージ
bb.name: タイダルウェイブ

dictionary.description: The Devil of the Sea, feared by sailors since ancient times. Not only ferocious and violent, but also very intelligent and able to talk with humans. However, since Leviathan has judged humans as evil that pollutes the sea, it sends every ship it meets to a watery grave. Sailors fear seeing it and always offer prayers and sacrifices before setting sail.
dictionary.fusion:
My strength is needed again?
If so, I need more sacrifices!
dictionary.summon:
My name is Leviathan.
You have a noble ambition.
I will lend you strength.

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の光

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: メイルシュトローム

dictionary.description: A giant dragon strongest among the sea drakes and deathly feared by man. Extremely intelligent, it will not attack others as long as it is unharmed. Its abilities far surpass a normal sea drake, to the extent that storms rise when it appears. Logness, leader of the proud sea drakes, is an impressive sight, and some sailors worship it.
dictionary.evolution:
With your help I became leader of the sea drakes.
I will use my abilities for you.
dictionary.fusion:
With just this power,
I rule the sea.
dictionary.summon:
You, he who subdued me.
Be not insolent.
Forget not the beauty of virtue.

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の光

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: カラミティウェイブ

dictionary.description: The greatest of all of the sea drakes, said to be their creator. Legend has it that its birth traces back to the birth of the world, and that all of the world's seas were created by it. It is said to be comparatively gentle, but once provoked, its rage is unforgiving, causing storm after storm until the the seas part and everything sinks to the abyss.
dictionary.evolution:
Do you think you can handle
the power that controls the entire sea?
dictionary.fusion:
I've lived for an eternity,
yet still grow stronger
every day...
dictionary.summon:
My existence is eternal.
I live to serve you.
Do not forget that.

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の威光

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: マディストリーム

dictionary.description: For a long time the name Felneus was only spoken of in stories. One such story said, "There was once a dragon that purified the water at the bottom of the sea." Another said, "All souls lost at sea return to Felneus." As widely and broadly depicted as it was, every mention of the sea dragon spoke of how powerful and magnificent it was. Once discovered there was an outcry that "The world has lost another of its secrets."
dictionary.evolution:
Summoner who commands me.
You awoke me from my slumber.
Now behold! My legendary power!
dictionary.fusion:
Great power resides in me.
I'll show you the awesome
depth of my power!
dictionary.summon:
Death to all who disturb the
silence of the great sea!
Watch my furious assault!

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の覇光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ
sbb.name: レイフラッド・ノア

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性４連ダメージ
bb.name: 海穿ちフラッドスピン

dictionary.description:
A pirate captain from the seas near the ruined Sama Kingdom.
He was raised by Verica after being found in a shipwreck of which he was the only survivor. When Mega inherited the captain's chair from Verica he gained the trust of his crew as well as the local pirates due to his good humored nature and incredible skill with an axe. He became known as the Captain.
dictionary.fusion:
Well, isn't this fun!
The sea roars at my strength!
dictionary.summon:
I am the axe captain!
I see you've been waiting for me. You will not be disappointed!

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 水神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: テンペストガロウズ

dictionary.description: A pirate captain from the seas near the ruined Sama Kingdom. Mega masterfully commanded his pirate crew until one day the Sama Kingdom Navy appeared. They requested he join them as their new admiral and help reorganize their forces. He had always hated the corrupt navy, but agreed to their terms and did his best to improve their reputation.
dictionary.evolution:
Can you feel the waves, too?
It would be a waste not to
ride them!
dictionary.fusion:
Argh, aha!
I have an entire Navy at
my command!
dictionary.summon:
Champion of the seas?
That's an understatement.
My axe is invincible!

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 水創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: サイクロンディザスター

dictionary.description: Master Commander of the ruined Sama Kingdom's navy. He first took his job as admiral as a joke, but after learning he was descended from the previous admiral began showing his true fortitude. He took on the gods, liberating the seas, all whilst rebuilding a corrupt navy. For his merits he received the treasured axe Poseidon.
dictionary.evolution:
Poseidon shakes with joy...
What a great time we'll surely have together!
dictionary.fusion:
Is there a limit to my power?
How should I know?!
dictionary.summon:
You, summoned me!?
Guess now there's little left
but for you to meet the Sea God.

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 水創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: フェデルタフラッド

dictionary.description: Former pirate leader and admiral of the Sama Kingdom Navy. Having lost his place as a pirate, some other pirates came to despise him. In order to pursuade them to change their minds, Mega sacrificed himself to save them from the gods' surprise attack. This left him gravely wounded, but resulted in the pirates having a change of heart. Mega smiled at this as he began to succumb to his wounds, but just then he was brought back by spirits from the sea, along with his treasured axe and the great spirit that resided within it.
dictionary.evolution:
Can you feel it?
The great spirit of the sea!
Not even a god can stop me!
dictionary.fusion:
Power, you know that's
exactly what I want!
Alright then, watch me now!
dictionary.summon:
The sea called me before.
Is it you who calls me now?
I've been waiting for some fun!

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 水翠神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１１連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
sbb.name: ポセイドンメーア

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ・ターン毎にＨＰを大回復
bb.name: デュカリオフラッド

extra skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＢゲージを増加＆スパークダメージを５０％アップ
extra skill.name: 目指すは大海の王者！

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を１００％アップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 水翠叡神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性２連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ＆味方全体のＨＰを大回復＆３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ・攻撃力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: ポセイドン・カタストロフ

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な水属性２１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率を超絶アップ・攻撃力を超絶アップ・防御力を転換して攻撃力を超絶アップ
ubb.name: 海皇統波

dictionary.description: A small nymph thought to be born from water, one of the six elements made by the gods. Along with its quiet demeanor, it prefers the water and rarely appears before humans. However, if its territory is invaded it will unleash relentless magic. Even still, Summoners seeking the Nymph's ability to grant powers to others frequently attempt to enter its realm.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Water Nymph, squish!
You're pretty interesting...
I'll join you, squish!

dictionary.description: A spirit that rules water, one of the six elements made by the gods. It hates polluters of ocean and will pretend to be a child to trick and pull in humans resting near the sea. However, it is naturally docile, and lore says it gives healing water to weary travelers. It is also said to bestow a great power to anyone willing to receive it.
dictionary.summon:
I will go with you.
I made up my mind.
Let us journey.

dictionary.description: Worshipers of the Water God brought this idol to life through prayer. Though originally thought to be a fairy tale in Elgaia, it was found for real by a Summoner in Grand Gaia. Although the statue injured the discoverer, it is still followed by those who believe the legend that it holds within it a great power.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Water Idol.
You seem to know who I am.
I will go with you.

dictionary.description: Created by the gods, it embodies the power of water. Referred to as a great disaster in ancient writings, it appeared along with the wrath of the gods, bringing floods along with it. There are a few reports of it in Grand Gaia. Torrential rains always fall around its massive body. Legend says that only those Summoners recognized by the gods can defeat it.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Water Totem.
You would be wise to correctly use
power sealed by the gods.

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性５連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: グレイシアサークル

dictionary.description: A pirate notorious for her misdeeds along the Kingdom of Sarma’s coast. Fearsome with a double-pronged pole sword, Stya is known for the savage work she made of any who dared to approach her. The image of her snow-white hair stained crimson with the blood of her victims gave rise to her sobriquet “Snow Flower”, though others claim the name came from her frosty demeanor coupled with her beautiful appearance.
dictionary.fusion:
Fusion, you say?
Pfft... Well, you’re welcome
to give it your best shot.
dictionary.summon:
Hah! A worthless Summoner like you
calling upon MY services!
Well then? Who do you want me to kill?

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性８連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: アバランシュゾーン

dictionary.description: A pirate captain notorious for her misdeeds along the Kingdom of Sarma’s coast. Whether swinging her frosty pole-sword or insulting her underlings with her icy tongue, Stya sent a chill down the spine of all whom she encountered. Her hatred for fellow sea-farer Captain Mega was so intense that she would dole out a vicious beating to any of her subordinates who so much as dared to mention his name.
dictionary.evolution:
You made me evolve, you say?
Whaddya want, a medal?
Ugh... Your enthusiasm’s making me nauseous.
dictionary.fusion:
Are you trying to butter me up?
If so, you’d better try harder...
dictionary.summon:
Hey, Summoner!
Just ‘cos I’m lending you my power,
doesn’t make us equal partners, OK?

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの煌めき

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性１０連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: エタニティーフィンブル

dictionary.description: A pirate captain notorious for her misdeeds along the Kingdom of Sarma’s coast. After hearing news that her arch-nemesis Captain Mega had joined the army, she immediately formed a band of pirates to launch a preemptory attack. She led with an iron fist as well as a predilection for creative insults, and was loved as a “princess” by those who followed her. Rumor has it that legendarily fearless Captain Mega took one look at her frosty visage before scarpering for safety.
dictionary.evolution:
Hmm... Maybe lending you my power
wasn’t such a bad idea, after all.
Next time, I’ve got your back!
dictionary.fusion:
I-I can feel the power overflowing...
I’m not happy about this,
by the way!
dictionary.summon:
You don’t learn, do you?
Still, I like your passion, kid.
From now on, my powers are yours!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの閃光

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性１２連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: フリージングフォルター

dictionary.description: A female pirate with a bad reputation in the Sama Kingdom. She continued her pirate activities even after the gods invaded until one day when the commander which she so despised, Mega, came to her requesting her assistance in battle. Right after she showered him with anger the gods began attacking her. Mega rushed to save her but was gravely injured in the process. Seeing this, Stya became angry like she never had before, vanquishing all enemies around her as she said, "A debt must always be repaid."
dictionary.evolution:
What's with that dumb look?
I said I'll help you, didn't I?
Rejoice, feeble Summoner!
dictionary.fusion:
Not bad, Summoner.
Your abilities aren't too bad.
Hey, that's a compliment!
dictionary.summon:
Well done, Summoner.
This time I'm gonna get that
moron for sure!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの閃光

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性１５連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: ジエロヴァッサー

dictionary.description: A female pirate with a bad reputation in the Sama Kingdom. After Mega fell in battle Stya went berserk, fighting against the gods while consumed with rage, and eventually ending up cornered by their greater numbers. However, Mega, who she had presumed dead, came to her rescue just in time. Without saying a word, she gave him a kiss and then returned to her ship to give orders to her crew. It is said that as a pirate queen, she was beautiful to watch while in command of her ship. On the other hand, her demon-like style of fighting was feared by even the gods themselves.
dictionary.evolution:
Who cares about the gods?!
Whoever dares to make me angry
will be sliced into tiny pieces!
dictionary.fusion:
Not bad for a worthless Summoner.
As a reward,
I'll make you my specialist.
dictionary.summon:
Great, another moron.
Just looking at you
reminds me of that idiot.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 心闘の神光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に水属性３０連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ出現率をアップ
sbb.name: ネプチューンレギア

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復＆３ターン、防御力を少しアップ
bb.name: エーテルガード

dictionary.description: A daughter from an aristocratic family hailing from the Sama Kingdom. A fervent reader, she was known to read academic tomes instead of picture books as a child. When she was 15, she stumbled across a book written in a mysterious language, and swore to one day decipher its contents. Hearing tales of remote stone monuments inscribed with a similar-looking script, she embarked on a journey into unchartered lands teeming with monsters, with only the magic she had learned from her books to protect her.
dictionary.fusion:
W-Wait...
I-Is this what I think it is?
(Gasp...!) FUSION!
dictionary.summon:
Ah, you’re summoning me now, is that it?
Gotcha. Ready when you are.

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の心

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復＆３ターン、防御力を少しアップ
bb.name: エーテルシールド

dictionary.description: A daughter from an aristocratic family hailing from the Sama Kingdom. Elimo traveled to the stone monuments, where she began to decipher the mysterious tome’s secrets. In time, she learned that the book contained information on a long-lost, esoteric form of magic. Harnessing the book’s techniques, Elimo’s dramatically improved magic abilities earned her the nickname “the Blue Sorceress”. Nevertheless, she continued on her journey, eager to discover the book’s remaining secrets.
dictionary.evolution:
Is this a...secret magic technique?!
If I could learn to channel these powers, then...
dictionary.fusion:
Those powers of yours...
They look like could be handy
in my research!
dictionary.summon:
You’ve summoned me, huh?
I’m not too hot at hand-to-hand combat,
but you should see me with a spell!

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の心

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復＆３ターン、防御力を少しアップ
bb.name: ガーディアンフォース

dictionary.description: A daughter from an aristocratic family hailing from the Sama Kingdom. On her travels from kingdom to kingdom, Elimo eventually reached the land of the gods, where she discovered it was they who had written the mysterious book she held. Impressed by her determination, the gods invited Elimo to become of them, but she refused. With her newly acquired divine techniques, Elimo subsequently spent her days wandering the land, imparting the gods’ wisdom to any who would listen.
dictionary.evolution:
My magic once belonged to the gods.
I’m happy to fight against them
if you want me to, though.
dictionary.fusion:
All the world’s wisdom should be shared
out equally among its people.
The same goes for this power...
dictionary.summon:
My magic was created by the gods.
Perhaps I should call it
“divine wisdom” instead...

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の真心

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復＆３ターン、防御力を少しアップ
bb.name: パンディットフォース

dictionary.description: A daughter from an aristocratic family hailing from the Sama Kingdom. When the gods invaded her hometown, she stood up against them holding their own book of magic in her hands. She was defeated, not having the ability to compete with the book's original owners, but she was able to escape death thanks to a god who took pity on her. After that, she trained herself to be able to resist the gods, improving upon the magic techniques she'd taken from them, but this time her goal was not to use them to attack the gods but to aid the suffering of her people.
dictionary.evolution:
My magic has evolved!
I'll use it to save people
as well as to fight!
dictionary.fusion:
I will use this power you
have given me wisely.
I promise not to fail you.
dictionary.summon:
I was once saved by the gods.
This time I was called by you.
What is it you desire of me?

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ出現率を大幅にアップ＆ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の煌き

sbb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復＆３ターン、防御力をアップ＆１ターン、被ダメージを軽減
sbb.name: エーテルタワー

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復＆１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: アストラルフォース

dictionary.description: A daughter from an aristocratic family hailing from the Sama Kingdom. After obtaining the wisdom of the gods and using it to gain restorative powers, she was visited again by the very gods who had granted her such knowledge, along with the lifeless bodies of those she had taught her techniques to. The gods spurned her for sharing her divine knowledge with others, as it had not been their will for her to do so. Although she regretted how foolish she had been for having done such a thing, she decided to confront the gods as a human, even when she was fully aware that her body would not be able to take the enormous power she planned to use against them.
dictionary.evolution:
I'm but a foolish human.
Even so...I want to use the
wisdom of the gods for our sake!
dictionary.fusion:
Too much power can only
bring about unhappiness.
Knowing this, will you still seek it?
dictionary.summon:
Creating new power is easier than
finding someone who can wield it.
That's much more difficult...

extra skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減＆確率で被ダメージを２０％軽減
extra skill.name: 深淵なる知識

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ出現率を超絶アップ＆ＨＣ獲得時の回復量を大幅にアップ＆確率で被ダメージを２０％軽減
leader skill.name: 慈愛の聖光

sbb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復＆３ターン、防御力をかなりアップ＆１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
sbb.name: エーテルクラウン

ubb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを全回復・全状態異常を無効・被ダメージを１/４に軽減・被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
ubb.name: 蒼星識

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: コールドソリッド

dictionary.description:
One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna.
Originally a high-ranking priest who specialized in ice magic, his refusal to bow down to authority resulted in his superiors exiling him into the wilderness. Plunged into despair by the gods’ attack on Palmyna and with nowhere to turn, he was relieved one day to receive a visit from a female knight and an old man, who invited him on a journey to defeat the rampaging gods.
dictionary.fusion:
Borrowing power from the likes of you...
My, how the mighty have fallen.
Still, can’t complain, I guess.
dictionary.summon:
You’re the one who summoned me, eh?
There’s no need to look quite so smug about it.
I can still decide to leave, you know.

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 水神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: ダイヤモンドダスト

dictionary.description:
One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna.
As a priest, Dean initially struggled with the idea of fighting against the gods––until he saw the carnage they were wreaking, that is. He used his sway over the frosty elements to freeze his enemies in their tracks. Though often described as a rowdy, somewhat coarse individual, his relentless banter also served as a source of much-needed comic relief among the four warriors.
dictionary.evolution:
You’re more capable than I thought.
Looks like I misjudged you.
Now let’s show the world we mean business!
dictionary.fusion:
That’s the stuff!
Now I’m even stronger than before!
You and me: we’re unstoppable!
dictionary.summon:
So you’re the one who saw
fit to summon me?
Very well. When do we get started?

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 水創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: アブソリュート・ゼロ

dictionary.description:
One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna.
By the time he reached the base of the gods’ assault on Palmyna, Dean’s power was already far superior to that of the average god. In the final showdown against the leader of the gods, he used all his magic reserves to freeze the enemy’s movement, creating just enough time for Loch to strike the final blow with his Zeus Bow. Along with the other three warriors, Dean’s eventual fate is shrouded in mystery.
dictionary.evolution:
Behold my newly evolved strength!
Umm... Who are you planning on using
it for, exactly?
dictionary.fusion:
Never underestimate the importance of growing stronger.
Not just in body,
but in mind, also.
dictionary.summon:
Do you see it? The glistening of ice!
Watch as my Blizzard Blast
freezes everything in sight!

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 水創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性９連ダメージ
bb.name: イスベルグレイン

dictionary.description: One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna. After the battle with Cardes, commander of the god army, was over, Dean found himself waking up on a beach in Amdahl. Trying to dig up memories which might explain why he had survived, he felt the power of the girl who had once led him. Then, feeling that she was still holding on to life, he decided to search for her and his other companions. His body then filled with energy, having surpassed his own limits.
dictionary.evolution:
My power is reborn.
Even power over the gods can't
give you what you want.
dictionary.fusion:
I once had a partner with
who I trained my very soul.
Do you have someone like that?
dictionary.summon:
My ice will show the way.
Allow me to search with you
for what you so desire!

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ・防御力・回復力を１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 水透神の力

sbb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復
sbb.name: リディニークゾーン

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性２連ダメージ＆高確率で病気状態にする
bb.name: ダブルバランガ

dictionary.description: A monster that inhabits snowy mountains, it enjoys the taste of human flesh and therefore is considered extremely dangerous to people. It's not easy escaping from beneath its massive claws, and most are simply swallowed up whole. They seem to be aware of their strengths and weaknesses, avoiding those who carry around thunder types. Summoners however often have trouble dealing with them as it's difficult to ascertain their element.
dictionary.fusion:
Wait!
I don't want this,
I want to eat you!
dictionary.summon:
You look delicious!
I guess I will follow you!

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性６連ダメージ＆高確率で病気状態にする
bb.name: バランガストーム

dictionary.description: A monster that gains all the knowledge held by the people it devours. Its defense is also greatly increased by the armor it wears which was stolen from humans it found in the past. They rarely form large groups, but they do seem to communicate with each other via a means of communication specific to their race which is comprised of gestures and very basic speech. It's even been said that Hrungnirs have formed militant groups to take revenge on humans who have attacked a certain individual's residence.
dictionary.evolution:
Have you seen me?
Look at how wonderful
my armor is!
dictionary.fusion:
Give me lots more!
If you do, I will become
more intelligent!
dictionary.summon:
My favorite thing is
the wisdom of humans!
You are wise too, right?

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性５連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ
bb.name: ダイヤモンドローズ

dictionary.description: A wicked woman shopkeeper once famous in the La Veda Republic. She was a talented woman who made her way as a peddler, eventually establishing a company in an area which was dominated by monsters. However, those jealous of her success spread nasty rumors that her company was built on deception, and she came to be known by the people as the "Black Rose." To this, it is said she stated, "If that's how it's going to be, I guess I should live up to my name."
dictionary.fusion:
Hehe, thank you very much.
I'll repay your kind investment
with ample interest.
dictionary.summon:
You wish to hire me?
The Black Rose isn't cheap,
you know?

leader skill.desc: 女性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 可憐なる力

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性７連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ
bb.name: クリスタルローズ

dictionary.description: A wicked woman shopkeeper once famous in the La Veda Republic. It is said she earned a fortune using her political connections by selling weapons during the war. She had apparently received large amounts of money from many influential people, but little is known other than that. Though many thought she lived a life of luxury, she instead donated all she could to places like orphanages and medical institutions, which would later be be brought to light by historians.
dictionary.evolution:
Are you fighting for the
betterment of the world?
I will do my best to assist you.
dictionary.fusion:
Of course I remember my
days fighting with this whip.
Of course I didn't torture anyone!
dictionary.summon:
Kneel down before me,
the Frozen Rose!
That's how I talk on the job.

leader skill.desc: 女性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 可憐なる力

dictionary.description: A curious creature that lives in a pot which is said to hold a power capable of dramatically changing the properties of water. They're known to speak in a particularly crude manner, though it's rumored that this is only because they're actually shy and simply unable to express themselves otherwise. They show particular resistance when first encountered and great effort is required in capturing them. However, it seems they'll let those to whom they open up to touch the prized horn on their forehead.
dictionary.summon:
What's with you?
Who said I wanted to be
summoned by you anyway!?

dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal Ghost is said to have changed after having amassed extensive records on the element of water. One must be patient in keeping company with them as they often complain by saying things like "I like cool places but I hate the cold," and "I don't like my food too hot or too cold." The element of water is much stronger in them than in normal Metal Ghosts, and it's said that when fused to other water types they provide loads more experience as well.
dictionary.summon:
You want my knowledge?
I don't mind giving it to you,
but can you use it?

dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal King is said to hold within its large body a huge collection of information on the element of water. Though gender doesn't exist in the metal record species of which Metal Kings are included, it is said that there are many Water Kings which talk and act more feminine than others. It was once said that because of this they were most often encountered by men, though there's been a lot of fuss since it came to light that this may not be so. However, despite this some still believe the rumors.
dictionary.evolution:
Oh!
I guess I've evolved.
Look what you can do!
dictionary.summon:
You'd like my power?
If you fuse me with someone
nice I'll consider it!

dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal God is said to hold within its massive body an enormous collection of information on the known world. Despite its shiny blue body leading many to think it's as cold as ice, it's really not that bad once you touch one. They also seem to like the look on peoples' faces when they realize this so they often call out to be touched. Though thanks to their rarity, when one says "Try and touch me," Summoners are quick to oblige.
dictionary.summon:
Do I look cold to you?
Hehe, try and touch me!
Come on! Touch me!

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性６連ダメージ＆高確率で麻痺・毒状態にする
bb.name: クリスタルバレット

dictionary.description: Rickel is not her name, but in fact the name of the guns she carries. In her native country's language, Rickel means "holy ice bullet," and as the name suggests Rickel is able to fire such bullets. However, the guns she holds choose their bearer, and normal folk aren't even able to hold them. Because of this, Rickel has taken on the same name as her guns, and is both feared and respected by those around her as "one chosen by the gods."
dictionary.fusion:
You wish to solve the
mystery that is "Rickel?"
That is surely impossible!
dictionary.summon:
I control Rickel.
No one can avoid being
frozen by its ice bullets!

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性１０連ダメージ＆高確率で麻痺・毒状態にする
bb.name: ダイアモンドレブル

dictionary.description: A marksman who took on the name of her beloved guns, Rickel. Witnessing her quick draw skills there are few who ever doubted that title, though she never once divulged her true name. She handled Rickel as if they were her lovers, seemingly in response to which their power increased. Watching her as she lived with her guns, eventually people came to see Rickel as not just the pair of guns, but as the guns and her.
dictionary.evolution:
No matter how much I change,
I will never be separated
from my guns, "Rickel."
dictionary.fusion:
Thanks, I guess.
I won't let the power you've
given Rickel go to waste.
dictionary.summon:
There's nothing that
Rickel can't turn to ice!
Leave the rest to us!

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の煌めき

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性１４連ダメージ＆高確率で麻痺・毒状態にする
bb.name: エンシェントバレット

dictionary.description: A marksman who took on the name of her beloved guns, Rickel. Though her lightning quick attacks saw her successfully through many a battle, she once found herself overwhelmed by the enemies swarming around her. Just when her life was in real peril, it's said Rickel was saved when her guns released a sudden cold blast that formed a massive pillar of ice all around her. This example has led many to believe that the guns have a will of their own.
dictionary.evolution:
Rickel has evolved!?
Hehe, that's fine with me.
I guess we're partners now!
dictionary.fusion:
Rickel is pleased...
Hehe, maybe you'd like to
try touching my guns?
dictionary.summon:
Bring it, all you
gods and demons!
I'll freeze you all!

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の閃光

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性１８連ダメージ＆高確率で麻痺・毒状態にする
bb.name: エンシェントオビス

dictionary.description: A marksman who came to be known as Rickel. During the intense battle with the gods, she recalled the time she received her beloved guns. Legend says she didn't consider them to have been given to her by the gods that day, but that on that day she formed a contract with "Rickel." The contents of the contract are unknown, but immediately upon recalling it she softly smiled as she kissed her guns. In that moment it is said that the guns began to shine, and before her eyes they took on a new form.
dictionary.evolution:
Rickel chose me.
That's why Rickel was and always
will be my partner.
dictionary.fusion:
Rickel and I are of the same mind.
Rickel and I have both grown
strong together.
dictionary.summon:
Rickel has recognized you.
Ah ha ha! It seems Rickel and I
are exactly the same after all!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＨＣ出現率を少しアップ・スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の心光

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な水属性２０連ダメージ＆高確率で麻痺・毒状態にする
sbb.name: クリスタルファナー

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性４連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
bb.name: 滅氷閃

dictionary.description: A young general from the Sama Kingdom. The hometown of some of the most memorable generals of the kingdom's forces. Having a friendlier relationship with the Savat people than that of his great-grandfather's time, he is also an old friend of one of the Six Heroes, Selena. Though known as a superficial womanizer of soft features, his power as a soldier and as a commander was very much real, serving as a firefighter during the incessant internal turmoil that took place within his country. He was said to never forget his chivalrous manners, no matter how intense the battle he found himself in was.
dictionary.fusion:
Hey!
When you're making me stronger next time
make sure you use only girls to power me up!
dictionary.summon:
I'm Jaegar, it's a pleasure.
By the way,
how many women are in your corps?

leader skill.desc: 戦闘開始から１ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 刹那の壊風

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性６連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
bb.name: 滅帝氷蓮閃

dictionary.description: A young general from the Sama Kingdom. To protect the women, he held his position at a great ice fort that would later become the ruins left behind by the great war against the gods. Afterwards, when the Savat People continued fighting in numerous battles, he tried to serve as their reinforcement and got his right eye injured by the enemy in the process. It is said that he confessed his love for Selena, the tribe chief who nursed him back to health, by stating that he wanted to convey his true feelings for her before he died. However, his life was not truly in danger at the time, so no one knows how sincere his words truly were.
dictionary.evolution:
I shall protect all of the beautiful women in this world!
I swear it by my lost eye!
dictionary.fusion:
So, which one of these girls is yours?
Maybe we could...
Whoa! Don't get so angry!
dictionary.summon:
Hey, Summoner, I wanna suggest something.
Choose beautiful women only to fight by my side.
I'm counting on ya!

leader skill.desc: 戦闘開始から１ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 刹那の神風

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: 氷斧陣

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Karl, a Summoner belonging to the Akras Summoners' Hall. Head of the 24th Demon Slayers Division "Rebel Lance," also known as "Nyonne." Considered to be one of the strongest Demon Slayers regiments, Nyonne was often counted upon by the Summoners' Hall's upper echelon. Karl's strength was well known, and he became famous in Elgaia for vanquishing the Wicked Drake Zagamlung. It's also been rumored an old friend of his has been active lately as well.
dictionary.fusion:
Fusion, eh? How wonderful!
I want to become even stronger
so I can be of assistance to you!
dictionary.summon:
You have summoned me.
I always believed that
this day would come!

leader skill.desc: 通常攻撃時、確率でＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 戦士の号令

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: 魔神蒼破斬

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Karl, a Summoner belonging to the Akras Summoners' Hall. Though already considered to be one of the strongest around, it is said his hidden power is even more outstanding. Karl's birth is clouded in mystery so much so that even he doesn't know anything himself, but there are some who believe he has ties to the Summoners' Hall's upper echelon, rumoring that "He's descended from kings," "His blood is that of a god's," and "He was born in Grand Gaia." Karl neither confirmed nor denied these claims, instead simply smiling in response.
dictionary.evolution:
What's this power!?
I can feel something strange
burning inside of me!
dictionary.fusion:
I must get stronger so that
I can fight alongside you!
I will always have your back!
dictionary.summon:
Hey there, my friend!
This is my ascended form.
I look forward to battle with you!

leader skill.desc: 通常攻撃時、確率でＢＢゲージを大幅に増加
leader skill.name: 英雄の号令

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１６連ダメージ
bb.name: 真・魔神蒼破斬

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Karl, a Summoner belonging to the Akras Summoners' Hall. Although the real Karl boasted of more physical power, the mystery of his origins made him uncomfortable, leading him to shut out the dormant power within him. However, Seria and his other Summoner childhood friends believed in him wholly, allowing him to finally release his power. It is highly speculated that his incredible hidden power had not originated from Grand Gaia.
dictionary.evolution:
Knowing that you believe in me
has finally allowed me to
believe in myself too.
dictionary.fusion:
Thanks for believing in me.
I'm not scared anymore
about the power dormant within me.
dictionary.summon:
It doesn't matter who I am.
I have people who believe in me.
That's all I need to move forward.

leader skill.desc: 通常攻撃時、ＢＢゲージを大幅に増加＆スパーク時、ＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: 閃神の号令

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性２４連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をアップ＆３ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: 天魔閃迅 蒼破斬

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１８連ダメージ＆３ターン、自分の攻撃力・防御力・回復力をかなりアップ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力をかなりアップ
bb.name: 魔神蒼竜破斬

extra skill.desc: ＢＢ及びＳＢＢに「味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ」を追加＆ＢＢゲージが半分以上の時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力をアップ
extra skill.name: 煌竜覇神の血脈

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力・最大ＨＰを４０％アップ＆通常攻撃時、ＢＢゲージを大幅に増加＆スパーク時、ＢＢゲージを少し増加＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 勇蒼竜神の豪咆

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性２６連ダメージ（連続発動で威力アップ）＆ＯＤゲージを少し増加＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力をかなりアップ・最大ＨＰに応じて攻撃力をアップ
sbb.name: 皇魔凄迅 蒼竜破斬

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な水属性２８連ダメージ（残りＨＰが多いほど、威力をアップ）＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力を超絶アップ・攻撃力・防御力を超絶アップ＆２ターン、ＢＢゲージを超絶増加
ubb.name: 神覇凍界『天零』

bb.desc: 敵全体に水・闇属性７連ダメージ＆確率で毒状態にする
bb.name: 絶対零度

dictionary.description: The second oldest of the Six Sibyl Sisters who fought against the gods in order to save the humans. Full of pride as a sibyl, it's said she always acted in a just manner. Because of this it's said that she viewed those with questionable values as wicked, and was comparatively more negative than her other sisters. At the beginning of the great war she followed her elder sister Sola in saving the humans, but in the midst of that she bore witness to the many evil deeds they were also capable of.
dictionary.fusion:
Humans are so pitiful.
You're not even aware of
your own hypocrisy.
dictionary.summon:
Why ally with a human?
Don't think you can understand
what a goddess is thinking.

leader skill.desc: 水・闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 水闇の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水・闇属性９連ダメージ＆確率で毒状態にする
bb.name: 永久凍土

dictionary.description: The second oldest of the Six Sibyl Sisters. When the great war with the gods first broke out she fought alongside her sisters in defense of the humans, but after witnessing endless atrocities committed by humans she decided she'd made a mistake. From that point forward she began wielding her blade against humans, becoming one of the feared Fresh Blood Sisters. It's said the origin of her hatred for her sister Freya came from the fact she overlooked the crimes of humans in favor of forgiving them.
dictionary.evolution:
My sister used to tell me that
not all humans are sinners.
Can you prove her right?
dictionary.fusion:
My blade, stained red with blood.
Even so, you still wish to use it?
Humans are such dreadful beings.
dictionary.summon:
You dare judge the gods?
Fine, then I shall decide whether
or not you decision is just.

leader skill.desc: 水・闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 水闇神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水・闇属性１５連ダメージ＆確率で毒状態にする
bb.name: 星霜氷界

dictionary.description: The second oldest of the Six Sibyl Sisters. With her heart already frozen, she continuously attacked her sister Freya, who sought to save the human race. Witnessing the strength of her younger sister's conviction, her heart began to thaw, though she still found herself unable to forgive humans. This also being because Eliza wanted to protect her younger sister, as she strongly believed that the innocent Freya would be once betrayed by the human race. And thus, Eliza encased her emotions in ice yet again and turned her body to freezing cold temperatures in order to hurt her beloved younger sister.
dictionary.evolution:
I've gotten rid of my emotions.
And you should as well, if you
don't want to be destroyed by them.
dictionary.fusion:
This carefreeness of yours
is something I can't grasp.
It's so...human...
dictionary.summon:
Humans commit atrocities unaware of
their actions. I must judge them,
no matter the outcome...

leader skill.desc: 水・闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を６５％アップ＆スパークダメージを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 水闇創神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水・闇属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に水・樹・闇属性を付与・攻撃力をアップ・クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
sbb.name: ナーデル・アズライト

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを回復・攻撃に水属性を付与
bb.name: アイシクルブライト

dictionary.description: A young girl of both holy and demonic descent. Persecuted equally for both races she came from, she ran away to the human world. However, people there failed to neither praise her as a god nor fear her as a demon. Then one day, a girl with an axe in both hands appeared before her. The girl requested she come along with her, saying "You're strong, right? Then you'll do fine as my assistant!"
dictionary.fusion:
I want to become stronger!
If I'm able to people will
like me more, won't they?
dictionary.summon:
D-Did you summon me?
Are you not afraid of me?
I'll do my very best for you!

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光の力

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを回復・攻撃に水属性を付与
bb.name: コールドソーラー

dictionary.description: A young girl of both holy and demonic descent. She continued on her journey with Michele to defeat Melchio. It is said she used the abilities of both races she descended from to protect her friends. During their travels it is said that Michele's mean words actually brought happiness to her, allowing her to become even stronger than before. Tiara would later say, "M-Michele saved me from isolation. I can become stronger for her."
dictionary.evolution:
I-I've gotten stronger!
I wonder if Michele will
compliment me now...
dictionary.fusion:
U-Ugh...
I can feel myself getting stronger...
Michele, I'll do my best!
dictionary.summon:
I'll give my all for those
who really need me.
Most especially Michele!

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光神の力

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを回復・攻撃に水属性を付与
bb.name: ディヴァインフロスト

dictionary.description: A young girl of both holy and demonic descent. She once defeated Melchio alongside Michele. However, when she saw how powerful his destructive forces had become after the light from above revived him, she was frozen with fear. Michele exclaimed that she had no room for wimpy friends and took on the villain by herself. Perhaps it was these words or the sight of her injured friend after her solitary battle, but something struck a nerve with Tiara, inspiring her to perform a miracle with her mix of holy and demonic powers.
dictionary.evolution:
I won't fight my strength any
longer. So please let me fight

by your side...
dictionary.fusion:
U-Ugh...
I can't hold myself back anymore.
Michele won't tolerate wimps!
dictionary.summon:
You're certainly no Michele...
But I trust you all the same.
Let's do this!

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 五光闘神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを大回復・攻撃に水属性を付与
sbb.name: レディアントフィンブル

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性４連ダメージ＆高確率で病気状態にする
bb.name: アクアバイト

dictionary.description: A ferocious demon fish that inhabits the many rivers of Grand Gaia. Hiding itself in the deep deposits of river banks, it is feared for the manner in which it attacks humans and animals who approach the river. With great leaping ability, it also boasts of a powerful jaw that can tear muscle into shreds. Not only that, but there are tales which say that if it leaps and happens to land on soil, it can move on the ground and chase its prey down quite a good distance away from the river itself.
dictionary.fusion:
Grr!
Grr! Grr!
dictionary.summon:
Chomp! Chomp!
Grr! Grr!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性５連ダメージ＆高確率で病気状態にする
bb.name: エビルスプラッシュ

dictionary.description: A ferocious demon fish that inhabits the many rivers of Grand Gaia. Deenan, which adapted the ability to move on land in its evolved form, is believed to have transfigured its fins into arms. Since there might be those which have no problem moving on land, there are accounts left behind of people being attacked by this creature in places with no trace of water. There have also been rumors of people who have seen this creature use its arms to swing from tree to tree, creating mass panic in towns and villages located near rivers.
dictionary.evolution:
Grrrrr?!
Grr! Chomp! Chomp! Chomp!
dictionary.fusion:
Grr! Chomp!
Chomp! Grr! Grr!
dictionary.summon:
Grr! Chomp! Chomp!
Grr! Grrrr! Grrrrrrr!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの輝き

bb.desc: 味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: テラ・ガード

dictionary.description: A freezing weapon created by the gods to seal away a disastrous fiery beast. Its ice crystal protected outer walls and overwhelming destructive force helped it to carry out its mission. However, Copra's true power lied in its ability to reconfigure its own armaments from ice. Copra had much room to grow strong in his battle against the raging beast, and in time his abilities surpassed even the gods' expectations.
dictionary.fusion:
My ice wall has grown thicker.
None shall pass.
dictionary.summon:
I am the Ice Keep Copra.
I was created by the gods.
I am the extinguisher of flames.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力・最大ＨＰを５％アップ
leader skill.name: 王者の聖域

20273.name: 氷喚塔獣エル・コプラ

bb.desc: 味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: エクサ・ガード

dictionary.description: A self-reconfiguring freezing weapon created by the gods to seal away a disastrous fiery beast. In the intense battle with the fiery beast, as it grew larger and its armaments stronger, it built around itself an indomitable frozen defense. With this power it managed at one point to completely seal the beast, though later an angel came and released him. The weapon of the gods wasn't concerned with good and evil, and lived only to follow commands.
dictionary.evolution:
I have evolved.
I will entrap all in the ice
which surrounds me.
dictionary.fusion:
I have become a
mountain of ice.
I will conceal all.
dictionary.summon:
I am the Ice Tower Tesla.
I was once used by the gods.
Dowsing flames, I obey the light.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力・最大ＨＰを１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の聖域

20274.name: 氷塔楼ダルナ・テスラ

bb.desc: 味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: ゼタ・ガード

dictionary.description: A freezing weapon created by the gods to seal away a disastrous fiery beast. After having released the disastrous beast, the Ice Tower shut down for repairs, at which time the gods considered using it once again in the fight against the humans. However, upon being restarted it had been reprogrammed by the Rebel Angel to view the gods as enemies. After eventually evolving into the Ice Fortress, it intervened many times in the gods' invasion, and came to be known as the fortress of humanity's hope.
dictionary.evolution:
I have awaken.
My body of ice has grown colder.
I am that which destroys all.
dictionary.fusion:
I am the Ice Fortress.
I will continue to grow.
It is what I was meant to do.
dictionary.summon:
I am Oulu.
I will use my cold power to
remove the gods.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆確率で被ダメージを２０％軽減
leader skill.name: 統神の聖域

sbb.desc: 味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減＆３ターン、防御力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: Ａ.Ｇ.Ｐ

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: ラストラム・ガード

dictionary.description: A super freezing weapon created by the gods which turned against its creators during the invasion of the God Army thanks to the influence of a rebellious angel. However, having suffered continuous attacks, its functionality began to break down. As its consciousness and movements began to slow down, it acquired its own free will, and choose to accept it before its body was completely destroyed. Now with a soul, the weapon managed to evolve into its final form in order to defend the young lady it swore to protect.
dictionary.evolution:
What is my new name...?
I must protect Lira.
dictionary.fusion:
Contact... 3 to 8 ratio.
Evolution possible.
Basic functions...operational.
dictionary.summon:
Protect...Lira.
Conversion 4A7.
Must risk own life...

extra skill.desc: 「ゴーレム・コア」を装備時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆ＢＢ及びＳＢＢに「味方全体に３ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力をアップ」を追加
extra skill.name: 魔動人形の意志

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆確率で被ダメージを２０％軽減
leader skill.name: 氷嶽神の聖域

20276.name: 氷嶽神ゼール・デウス

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力をかなりアップ＆１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
sbb.name: Ａ.Ｇ.Ｗ

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な水属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力を大幅にアップ・防御力に応じて攻撃力を超絶アップ＆２ターン、被ダメージを１/４に軽減
ubb.name: フル・ディジェネレイト

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性８連ダメージ＆確率で麻痺状態にする
bb.name: ブリザードサイズ

dictionary.description: A scientist from another world whose body is partly made up by a machine which releases cold air. She was developing a suit of armor that could boost its wearer's abilities when it went on a rampage, eventually taking her older brother's life. After being sucked into another world along with the armor she was rescued by a mage named Rashil. Uninterested in the mage who was after Cyborg Lilith, who happened to be her assistant in her home world, Reeze integrated machinery into her wounded body. She required the strength to destroy the armor that she had created.
dictionary.fusion:
Nngh...
It's alright, it doesn't hurt...
Make me stronger...
dictionary.summon:
I am a wicked girl.
I've exploited the dead for
my own selfish reasons.

leader skill.desc: 全ての状態異常にかなりかかりにくくなる
leader skill.name: 青浄の光風

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１０連ダメージ＆確率で麻痺状態にする
bb.name: アゼリオン・ネーヴェ

dictionary.description: A scientist from another world whose body is partly made up by a machine which releases cold air. Having heard rumors of her older brother's armor-clad enemy, she headed for their source, the Bariura Empire. On her way she would come to meet many people including a loud-mouthed martial artist and twin sword wielding warrior, but not once did any sign of happiness appear on her face. With almost tragic determination she silently worked on modifying herself, advancing her abilities to a state above that of a normal human, all the while accompanied by her cyborg weapon.
dictionary.evolution:
I can't forgive myself.
That's why I will continue
even if it destroys me...
dictionary.fusion:
Oww...
No good, still not enough...
I need more power...
dictionary.summon:
You forgive what I've done?
I'll follow you as believing your
words has made me weak.

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効
leader skill.name: 蒼穹の神風

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１１連ダメージ＆確率で麻痺状態にする
bb.name: エンシェントヘイル

dictionary.description: A scientist from another world whose body is partly made up by a machine. When she regained consciousness after being defeated by her sworn enemy, she found herself next to a twin sword wielding warrior clutching a piece of the armor she was after. In order to exact her revenge, she travelled to the Principality of Vriksha to learn the other world's technology. She gained the knowledge she was seeking from their army, but right before the gods' invasion. Instead of focusing on revenge, it is said she utilized her new expertise against the gods.
dictionary.evolution:
I don't get this power that fills me.
But I'll use it for revenge...
And redemption...
dictionary.fusion:
Huh...
It doesn't hurt anymore.
But this was just what I wanted...
dictionary.summon:
I'm at your service.
It's the least I can do.
