And I trust you.

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効＆被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: 永遠の激動

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１４連ダメージ＆３ターン、自分の攻撃力・防御力・回復力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: デスノース

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１６連ダメージ＆確率で麻痺・病気状態にする＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、確率で麻痺・病気を発生する効果を付与
bb.name: ヘイルディソリュート

dictionary.description: During the battle against the gods, Reeze's friends came to her rescue. However, they each began falling one by one in battle as she cursed her own powerlessness. At that moment, a gate towards another world opened, bringing with it a curious object. This object had the ability to change Reeze into one of the Six Armors, and had actually been sent by her older brother. It was then when Reeze decided to abandon her humanity to gain the Armors' power. Once the battle was over, it is said that all that was left beside her was an immobile mechanical doll.
dictionary.evolution:
My name is Reeze...
No. 3 of Reis's Six Armors...
A human and Armor hybrid...
dictionary.fusion:
I can't feel pain anymore...
That fills me with great sadness...
Please tell me what I should do...
dictionary.summon:
My brother, he...
No. It won't change anything.
It was me who wanted this power...

extra skill.desc: 「氷輝天鎧レーゼ」を装備時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆ＢＢ及びＳＢＢに「味方全体に３ターン、全状態異常を無効」を追加
extra skill.name: 人では無い存在へ

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効＆ターン毎にＨＰを回復＆被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 永遠の麗星命

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１８連ダメージ＆３ターン、自分の攻撃力・防御力・回復力を超絶アップ＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、回復力に応じて防御力をアップ
sbb.name: 限装解除：リフトライズ

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な水属性２２連ダメージ＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆確率で一度だけ戦闘不能を耐える効果を付与
ubb.name: ターミナス・アド・クェム

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性７連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
bb.name: デッドリークロウ

dictionary.description: A martial artist who escorted many civilians to El Gaia during the last stages of the war with the gods. After mastering the art of the Toltya Dojo, he fought in the frontlines at the start of the war using swift attacks. However, he was ordered by his dojo to protect the people making their way to El Gaia. Rhein accepted quietly, but it is said that he actually wanted to continue fighting in the frontlines. That is when he first met the soldier leading said group.
dictionary.fusion:
I need more power
to help more people.
That's why I'm asking you to make me stronger.
dictionary.summon:
I answered your calling, Summoner.
From now on,
I'll be your arms and legs.

leader skill.desc: 戦闘開始から２ターン、攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 刹那の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１１連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
bb.name: メルトガーディアン

dictionary.description: A martial artist who escorted many civilians to El Gaia during the last stages of the war with the gods. Bringing refugees to El Gaia under Reed, he put his swiftness back to use by scouting the land. He escaped from danger countless of times probing for information about the god army's movements. It is also said that he used the secret Toltya techniques he had learned to work as an assassin behind the scenes. Though taciturn, his subtle consideration for others gained him favor with the civilians.
dictionary.evolution:
These fists I trained so hard
have come back.
I'll show you my secret techniques
time and again!
dictionary.fusion:
Strength is not a bad thing.
If you use it correctly,
that is.
dictionary.summon:
Looks like you need my skills now.
I don't know how I feel about that.

leader skill.desc: 戦闘開始から２ターン、攻撃力を７５％アップ
leader skill.name: 刹那の剛力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
bb.name: スクライドアクティス

dictionary.description: A martial artist who escorted many civilians to Elgaia during the last stages of the war with the gods. Moments after barely reaching the entrance to Lucius's gate, Rhein sensed an incoming attack from the God Army. Separating from his friends he went after the group meant to ambush them in order to buy time for his friends to cross the gate. It is said that this deed alone was enough to earn him a place in the annals of the Toltya Dojo's history. Finally, there are two legends which tell of Rhein's end: one that claims he exhausted all his power fighting in Grand Gaia, and one that claims that he made it safely to Elgaia.
dictionary.evolution:
Your heart has reached out to me!
Now I know I can pull off
the secret art of the Toltya Dojo!
dictionary.fusion:
Seeking power beyond one's limit
can prove deadly when done
incorrectly. You know that, right?
dictionary.summon:
They taught me how to use my powers.
That's why I was able to put my life
on the line as I fought.

leader skill.desc: 戦闘開始から２ターン、攻撃力を１００％アップ
leader skill.name: 刹那の神力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１５連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力を１ターン大幅に低下＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
sbb.name: 天裂爪『無尽絶鬼』

dictionary.description: There's a story in Elgaia about a frog with a voracious appetite matched by its younger brother. In the younger brother's quest for the throne, it tried obtaining knowledge about every weapon in the world. However, it never had a chance to use this knowledge against its brother, for every other being in the world was after its power. Legend has it that the elder of the two had the ability to wield two spheres at once.
dictionary.summon:
Ribbit, ribbit, ribbit!
Thank your lucky stars you met me!
I'll ribbit you with some new power!

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性３連ダメージ＆確率で怪我状態にする
bb.name: 唐竹割り

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２０％アップ・防御力を１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 龍陣

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性５連ダメージ＆確率で怪我状態にする
bb.name: 飛翔脳天撃

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２０％アップ・防御力を１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 龍陣

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性６連ダメージ＆確率で怪我状態にする
bb.name: モルテニクス

dictionary.description: One of the 12 Guardians of the Gods. Signas, who grew up alone in the freezing cold mountains, detested being with humans. The only one she opened her heart to was Sodis, the person who brought her into the 12 Guardians and the one person who understood her. He didn't require Signas to act as part of the group, instead allowing her to follow her own thoughts and will. In this, she was different from the other Guardians, acting not of divine will but of her own judgement.
dictionary.fusion:
Worry not,
I am only here to
fulfill my duty.
dictionary.summon:
Me? I'm Signas.
I'm one of the 12 Guardians.
Anyway, nice to meet you.

leader skill.desc: 炎属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 炎の護り

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性７連ダメージ＆確率で怪我状態にする
bb.name: モルテアニマ

dictionary.description: A former Guardian who turned her aim on the gods themselves. She acted quickly after getting word of Sodis' defection. Quickly rushing to his side, she cut down all those who were chasing after him. Afterwards scholars would say that she believed more in him than she ever had in the gods and that, even if he should become the bad guy, she would put her life on the line to follow him.
dictionary.evolution:
I put my trust in him.
I still trust him even now.
It's as simple as that.
dictionary.fusion:
You're pretty interesting.
No need to be polite with me.
Pretty sure I've told you before.
dictionary.summon:
I'm Signas.
Do I need to say more?
I don't like troublesome things.

leader skill.desc: 炎属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 炎の結界

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性９連ダメージ＆確率で怪我状態にする
bb.name: モルテゼウス

dictionary.description: A former Guardian who turned her aim on the gods themselves. Signas' unwielding blade cut down what were once her allies. Many of the Guardians had never seen her fight before, and her strange movements made her difficult to fight. Though not recorded in any history books, there is a legend that says that Signas, having survived the clash of the Guardians, traveled from country to country, preparing warriors whose names would one day be famous for the invasion of the gods.
dictionary.evolution:
Faith in others is important.
I was able to grow stronger
because I had faith in another.
dictionary.fusion:
I graciously accept this gift.
I'll take anything that helps
me grow stronger.
dictionary.summon:
I would like to believe in the
path you've decided to take.
I will protect you as you go.

leader skill.desc: 炎属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減＆水属性の弱点属性ダメージをアップ
leader skill.name: 炎神の断罪

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１１連ダメージ＆確率で怪我状態にする＆味方全体に３ターン、水属性ユニットの攻撃力をアップ
sbb.name: モルテシグネス

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１３連ダメージ＆確率で毒・怪我状態にする＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: モルテヴェルト

dictionary.description: After losing an eye to the blade of a former comrade, Signas was rescued from certain death by Grybe, who struggled to keep Farlon at bay. Badly injured, Signas tried to make her way towards Sodis only to witness a horrible scene. It was then when Signas erased her name from the history books and began training a secret resistance against the gods. No one knows what became of her afterwards, but some legends claim that she volunteered to take care of the children who had fled from the wrath of the gods, earning her a reputation as the "One-Eyed Swordswoman."
dictionary.evolution:
Losing a battle is not the same
as giving up on everything.
I'll fight once more, for you.
dictionary.fusion:
Even if you make me stronger,
I still won't be able to save anyone.
You're better off helping others.
dictionary.summon:
Working together is difficult,
but it brings out our true powers.
If we could all just join forces...

extra skill.desc: クリティカル時、ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
extra skill.name: 牙を研ぐ狼

leader skill.desc: 炎属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減＆水属性ユニットの弱点属性ダメージを大幅にアップ＆クリティカルダメージをかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 蒼毅神の断罪

20326.name: 雪嵐の蒼牙獅シグネス

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、水属性ユニットの攻撃力をアップ・クリティカル率を大幅にアップ・クリティカルダメージをアップ
sbb.name: コンゲラティオ

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な水属性２２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカルダメージを超絶アップ＆２ターン、炎属性ユニットからの被ダメージを超絶軽減
ubb.name: ギャラント・サヴァイヴァー

dictionary.description: This magical creature is said to systemize and store all Water-related knowledge that Metal Units can hold within them. They always appear to be in a foul mood and no one understands what they're always ranting about. Asking them about it only stirs more trouble, and even troublesome Water Ghosts try to put on a smile to cheer them up. However, whenever they notice that their companions are not truly listening, they get even more upset and leave without a word.
dictionary.summon:
Hey you, Summoner.
What are those raindrop-shaped...
Hey, are you listening?

20334.name: 水のクリスタルゴッド

dictionary.description: An incarnation of the power of Water from another world. Legend has it these beings are the key to unlocking powers greater than those of the gods. They were created by organisms who sought to evolve themselves onto a higher form. However, no matter how pure the water they had gathered was, it began flowing out of control, causing calamity and destruction. It is said that as the collected water flowed it clung onto an impure soul, completely cleansing it and allowing it to sublimate onto a higher plane. If one is able to control the power of a Mecha God, the power of limitless Water may become theirs.
dictionary.summon:
You summon the power of Water...
Are you prepared to accept
your own wrongdoings?

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをアップ
bb.name: フラッドホーン

dictionary.description: A young spearman who had been newly recruited into the 12 Guardians. It's said the dexterous dual spear-wielder was Alyut's closest friend. The prudishly polite Raydn was expected to be lieutenant to the future leader Alyut who was currently second in line to command. He worked hard to live up to these expectations, eventually attaining abilities that rivaled even Sodis.
dictionary.fusion:
What an interesting skill you have.
However, though it trains the body,
it does nothing for the soul.
dictionary.summon:
A Summoner.
I see how it is.
I accept your request.

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 水神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをアップ
bb.name: アトランティス

dictionary.description: The cool-headed Guardian with superior spear wielding skills who chased after the traitors. Not even word of Sodis' betrayel stirred him as he then proceeded to investigate his movements, guessing at why he might've rebelled. Once he received instructions from the gods via his good friend to track down and vanquish the traitors, without hesitation he joined the fight against them. Though he held much doubt in his heart, he couldn't help but assist his dear friend.
dictionary.evolution:
I refuse to brag about my power.
However, I am still confident in it.
I've put in a lot of effort.
dictionary.fusion:
I'm grateful for your deed.
I'd like to return the favor so please
command me as you wish.
dictionary.summon:
There's no need to say anything.
I know what you want to say.
Let us be on our way.

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 水創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ
bb.name: ファルメットランサー

dictionary.description: The cool-headed Guardian with superior spear wielding skills who fought for his good friend. Upon seeing Sodis he realized instantly thta he had no ill will towards him. However, he countered any who dare interfere in the fight between Sodis and his friend who wished to fight him one on one. There are some who say he sided with the traitors, nothing that at one point he vanquished a horde of priests who had come to defeat Sodis.
dictionary.evolution:
Let us understand what power is.
You seem to be an interesting one.
There's someone you should meet.
dictionary.fusion:
You're quite relentless to have
put so much into my training.
I'll try to meet your expectations.
dictionary.summon:
I only wish to carry out my will.
It's just that my objectives seem
to sometimes match up with yours.

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を６５％アップ
leader skill.name: 水統神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ＆２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
sbb.name: ニヴルヘイム

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与＆３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ
bb.name: フルゴールランサー

extra skill.desc: 与ダメージが一定数を超える度にＢＢゲージを増加
extra skill.name: 背を守る氷壁

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を１２０％アップ＆確率でスパークダメージ耐性を２ターン低下＆スパークダメージを１００％アップ
leader skill.name: 水穿閃神の力

20356.name: 槍戟凍神帝レディオン

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与＆３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ・防御力に応じて攻撃力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: エーリヴァーガル

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な水属性２２連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与＆３ターン、スパークダメージを超絶アップ・防御力に応じて攻撃力を超絶アップ
ubb.name: ビヴロスト

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に樹属性を付与
bb.name: サイクロンオウス

dictionary.description: A knight sworn to the Sama Kingdom, she was raised alone by her navy general father. At a young age, she was treated as a freak by others for her inability to control her innate magical powers. Though quiet and introverted, thanks to her father's training, her skills with the sword were rumored to eclipse even those of her dear friend Selena. Though she usually accepted Selena and her father's harsh words without a peep, on occasion she is said to have the mouth of a sailor.
dictionary.fusion:
Practice makes perfect.
Anybody should know that.
But few seem to.
dictionary.summon:
No need to chit-chat.
I'm here to do my job.
Not be your pal.

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に樹属性を付与
bb.name: グラウンドヴァルナー

dictionary.description: A knight sworn to the Sama Kingdom. Her father started a civil war there, in hopes to purge the navy of its corruption. Unbeknownst to them, he was playing into the hands of their rival kingdom. Lucina and Selena spared no effort in trying to rescue him from the ravages of war. However, he vanished leaving a mysterious letter--one with the whereabouts of the mother she assumed to be dead.
dictionary.evolution:
Something inside me is...
waking up...
What is this feeling?
dictionary.fusion:
Brute force isn't perfect.
But it's all I know.
No more denying that.
dictionary.summon:
My blade has its faults.
And so do I. If we're a burden,
get rid of us both.

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光神の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に樹属性を付与
bb.name: メビウスネイド

dictionary.description: A knight sworn to the Sama Kingdom. Relying on a letter left by her father, she learned through her travels that her mother was the daughter of the ruler of all the fauna in the oceanic depths. She knew she could deny her divine marine powers no longer, instead unleashing them when the war against the gods began. Rushing back to her friend's side in her homeland, her awakened prowess with the sword was enough to drive them away from Selena in an instant.
dictionary.evolution:
I feel so free...
So... clear!
This feels great!
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel it.
Both Water and Earth.
It must be my mother...
dictionary.summon:
I've come to grips with
my imperfections. So I hope
you will too.

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ＆確率で防御貫通効果を付与
leader skill.name: 五光壊神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に樹属性を付与・攻撃力をアップ
sbb.name: 大氷界

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に水・樹属性を付与・通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数を増加・ターン毎にＨＰを大回復
bb.name: サフィーロメビウス

extra skill.desc: ＨＰが満タン時、攻撃力をかなりアップ＆ＢＢ及びＳＢＢに「味方全体に３ターン、最大ＨＰに応じて防御力をアップ」を追加
extra skill.name: 母なる海嘯

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を１００％アップ・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆確率で防御貫通効果を付与
leader skill.name: 五光穹神の壊撃

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に水・樹属性を付与・攻撃力をかなりアップ・通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数を増加
sbb.name: 蒼碧幻氷界

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な水属性２４連ダメージ＆３ターン、ターン終了時に超強力な追加ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力を超絶アップ・被ダメージ時、ＨＰを超絶回復
ubb.name: スヴァンフヴィート・ブレス

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: ロガールフラス

dictionary.description: A goddess that was once imprisoned for having committed a grave crime. According to legend, prior to the gods deciding to destroy humans, this god had preached that they were useless long before that. For this reason, she was considered more dangerous than other higher ranking gods, and her cooperation with Nalmika's transgression became the eventual cause of her imprisonment. During the time of the great war, she was released and given the mission to exterminate mankind, and she acknowledged it immediately, descending with Nalmika.
dictionary.fusion:
Is this Fusion...?
I see.
So inferior species fashioned a tool just as inferior as they are, didn't they?
dictionary.summon:
To think that these inferior monkeys could summon a god...
What a terrible sign of the times.

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減
leader skill.name: 王者の魔力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: ロガールセイブ

dictionary.description: A goddess that was once imprisoned for having committed a grave crime. Having descended above ground, even when the gods were being invaded, she saw how the humans kept fighting each other, and re-confirmed her belief that humans were completely useless. Starting by destroying the fishing harbor of the Agni Empire with Nalmika, they made sure not a single soul could enter the city. After that, they went on a destructive rampage that was carried on in various famous places.
dictionary.evolution:
It's a total waste to show this to mere monkeys,
but I'll allow you to see my new form.
dictionary.fusion:
Even if you are just a monkey, I'll accept this as tribute.
Because I'm a benevolent goddess.
dictionary.summon:
I don't care for the fact that I was summoned by a lowly ape.
I shall display my frustration on the battlefield.

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減
leader skill.name: 覇王の魔力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: アブラクサス

dictionary.description: A goddess who was imprisoned by the gods. When she descended and destroyed numerous towns, she was ambushed in the Agni Empire by the Fire God Lava. However, Lava's attacks had no effect on Phee, and was instead put into a corner herself. Sensing her last moment was near, Lava handed over her wings to someone else, inadvertently causing Phee to lose interest in facing her on the battlefield. Once Phee learned that Lava's fighting spirit had awaken once more, she sought her again in hopes of fighting her.
dictionary.evolution:
My power has been revived?
The way you carry yourself when you give a god a new body
pleases me greatly.
dictionary.fusion:
You're giving power to me, a former enemy of humans?
Well, you truly are a commendable monkey.
Could you feel the true power of a goddess?
dictionary.summon:
You have the power to summon me in this form.
You're not a normal ape, are you?
I shall heed your request.

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量をかなり軽減
leader skill.name: 統神の魔力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１５連ダメージ＆自分のＨＣ出現率を超絶アップ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＨＣ出現率をアップ
sbb.name: 暴虐の祈り

dictionary.description: These creatures are said to have come about as workers around the time of creation. Though incredibly valuable, they are aware of their role and fuse easily into others. Their particular role is to protect the bodies and spirits of their counterparts. Thanks to their entrenched power, they can permanently raise the Def of those they fuse into. It is said that at the time of creation the gods forced them to create an indestructible weapon...
dictionary.summon:
I know times have changed...
I'm just an expendable...
Let's get it over with!

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率をアップ
bb.name: ブラックインパクト

dictionary.description: Long before the battle between the humans and the gods, a supreme ruler was able to build his own vast territory in the historical Agni Empire. After becoming emperor, he appointed soldiers, wizards, and strategists to his court regardless of their origins. This policy gained the people's favor for the emperor, and became a huge reason behind their support for the empire. However, Mariudeth himself believed in his own strength without the reliance of neither magic nor strategy, but as he tried to tolerate it, his heart started to open more day by day.
dictionary.fusion:
It's not enough, not enough!
Don't think that my desires
will be satisfied this easily!
dictionary.summon:
So you summoned me,
an old supreme ruler.
I'm disappointed.
Are you going to show me your power?

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージをアップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の刃

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率をかなりアップ
bb.name: アンブラークリーク

dictionary.description: Long before the battle between the humans and the gods, a supreme ruler was able to build his own vast territory in the historical Agni Empire. He was known by his comrades as a sociable man, sometimes even found drinking with his soldiers while camping out. However, he had absolutely no mercy for his enemies, ransacking cities which had already surrendered, going on massive killing sprees, and thoughtlessly murdering soldiers who did not wish to fight in order to boost his army's morale. It is said that for this reason, he was feared not only by enemy countries, but by his allies as well.
dictionary.evolution:
Subjugating my enemies
is what I enjoy about military rule!
Now, off to a new battlefield!
dictionary.fusion:
You must know your enemies
from your friends.
Will you offer me a token of your understanding?
dictionary.summon:
You who summoned me without fear.
If you have so much courage,
I will acknowledge you as my equal.

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージをかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の鋭刃

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: ブレイブアーク

dictionary.description: Long before the battle between the humans and the gods, a supreme ruler was able to build his own vast territory in the historical Agni Empire. It is said that while wielding a giant axe with great ease that normally took the strength of three men to lift, he split in half the giants his enemies had employed as mercenaries while fighting in the frontlines. However, some wizards doubted his abilities, though the supreme ruler paid them no mind and laughed their rumors off heartily.
dictionary.evolution:
My black axe feels light.
Seems like you know a thing or two
about the essence of power.
dictionary.fusion:
It doesn't matter
how close you are to someone,
one day you will part.
It doesn't mean anything.
dictionary.summon:
No matter how many people
you get on your side,
in the end you can only rely on your own power.

leader skill.desc: 確率で防御貫通効果を付与＆クリティカルダメージをかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 破壊神の閃撃

20455.name: 黒斧覇神マリュデフス

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
sbb.name: 黒い海

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１４連ダメージ
bb.name: リプルランペイジ

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 水神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１６連ダメージ＆確率で怪我状態にする
bb.name: タイダルディスチャージ

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 水創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１８連ダメージ＆確率で怪我状態にする
bb.name: ガトリングウェイブ

leader skill.desc: 水属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 水創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性７連ダメージ＆確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: ノーブルスティング

dictionary.description: The third prince of the Sama Kingdom, who fought against the god army as the commander of the Sama Navy. Excelling in both swordsmanship and magic, many great things were expected from him in the future. However, due to his overly docile personality it became apparent that he was too quick to agree with other people's suggestions, eventually resulting in great commotion within his naval division. Also, as a passionate supporter of Selena, one of the Six Heroes, he began painting pictures of her without her consent and proceeded to exhibit them publicly. There are rumors which state that he was asked to keep his distance from her after the incident.
dictionary.fusion:
I see.
One can grow this way too.
You're quite knowledgeable.
dictionary.summon:
You need my power, right?
Fine, I'll follow you.
It must be for the best.

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: 力の鼓動

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１０連ダメージ＆確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: エスティーンスティング

dictionary.description: The third prince of the Sama Kingdom, who fought against the god army to protect his people. He continued to repel the god army with his own military prowess, but could not quell the unrest happening within the navy, even as its commander. However, the whole situation changed when he invited War Captain Mega to join the navy. Realizing that the problem was Arius himself, Mega threw it in his face. After hearing what Mega had to say, Arius then resigned as commander and passed the responsibility onto Mega. From then on the prince fought as a soldier on his own. It is said that this proved to be much more effective than his previous efforts.
dictionary.evolution:
Because I know my faults
I have power worth showing.
I can become stronger!
dictionary.fusion:
What a strange technique.
I will not put to waste
this power you have given me.
dictionary.summon:
You summoned me here?
Leave the fighting to me!
You come up with the strategy.

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 神撃の鼓動

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１３連ダメージ＆確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: セイクリッドスティング

dictionary.description: The third prince of the Sama Kingdom. He had been fighting as a soldier on his own, but due to War Captain Mega's injury, he was reinstated as commander of the navy in a hurry. Always trying to think as Mega would have, he dealt with his subordinates by listening to their reports and suggestions. With a firm attitude completely different than before, there were many who voiced their desire to make his position official, to which Arius declined politely saying that he could never measure up to "the real deal." As soon as Mega had recovered from his injury, Arius returned to the battlefield with new and improved sword fighting skills.
dictionary.evolution:
I can finally trust
in my own power.
Thus, my sword is yours.
dictionary.fusion:
You know exactly what kind
of power I need to grow.
It reminds me of him back then.
dictionary.summon:
Trusting and relying on people
are two different things.
That's what I realized back then.

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加＆ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の脈動

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１６連ダメージ＆確率で弱体状態にする＆味方全体のＨＰを大回復
sbb.name: ブレシィングスラッシュ

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性８連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: クルーエルストリーム

dictionary.description: A sorceress from the Sama Kingdom. Innately gifted with magical powers, she was expected to become the greatest sorceress in the land once she received proper instruction. However, due to her silent and introverted personality, most priests refused to teach her and she was confined to the mountains. There she created her own magic research laboratory, where by chance she would find a seriously injured knight one day. Thanks to her devoted nursing, the knight was able to escape death. However, some days later a woman with a revelation from the gods appeared, and the knight left with her.
dictionary.fusion:
Huh...?
Oh, forget it...
dictionary.summon:
A Summoner...?
Please, don't bother me with much...

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの最大ＨＰを１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 王者の天啓

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１０連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージをかなり増加
bb.name: ルースレスカスケイド

dictionary.description: A sorceress from the Sama Kingdom. When the gods began invading the land she received a letter from her motherland which stated that it was being ravaged by the war. And though she did not usually care much for people, she decided to head towards the battlefield in order to help her powerless countrymen. She saved many with her powers, receiving great praise from the royal family. She was unmoved by this, however, and decided to continue lending her powers to those who did not have any of their own. That is, until the knight she had nursed back to health appeared in front of her once more.
dictionary.evolution:
I didn't ask for this power...
But I do need it...
dictionary.fusion:
Are you making me stronger...?
I owe you...
dictionary.summon:
I'm no good at chatting...
Sorry...

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の天啓

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１２連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加
bb.name: アープインジェクション

dictionary.description: A sorceress who betrayed the human race to join the God Army. Though she had been part of Sama's Imperial Army, she suddenly fled, later appearing amidst the gods' troops which where attacking Atharva. The reason for her betrayal is unknown, and though many theories have come about, no valid reasons for her actions have been found thus far. Towards the end of the war, Eze, one of the Six Heroes appeared before her. It is said that Eze got no reaction from Kuhla after approching her, but that she just proceeded to fiercely spread carnage.
dictionary.evolution:
Fine...
I trust you somewhat...
dictionary.fusion:
Yes, I got stronger...
Thanks...
dictionary.summon:
Talking with you
reminds me of him...

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復
leader skill.name: 統神の天啓

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をかなりアップ・ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
sbb.name: アクエリアス

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性１１連ダメージ＆自分のＢＢゲージを満タンにする
bb.name: リニアフロスト

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Noah, a Summoner of the Regular Army. Before, Noah was the commanding officer of the Demon Slayers, and everyone had very high expectations of him and his future. However, after failing a certain demon subjugating mission, he left the division responsible for it, and returned to the Regular Army as a mere Summoner. Afterwards, Noah came to dislike making friends and became completely independent of others, forging his skills alone as best as he possibly could.
dictionary.fusion:
I don't believe in handouts of power.
To become stronger
all I need is my own will.
dictionary.summon:
You wanna use me?
Don't make me laugh.
You think you're stronger than me?

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効
leader skill.name: 蒼穹の神風

bb.desc: 敵単体に強力な水属性１７連ダメージ＆自分のＢＢゲージをＢＢまで満タンにする
bb.name: ノーブルデスペラード

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Noah, a Summoner of the Regular Army. A Summoner from whom many great things were expected of, and of so much raw talent and potential that his greatness was acknowledged by all. It is rumored that he received the divine protection of a powerful water spirit as a child, but he has no recollection of this. Now he lives with his heart shut to all those around him, continuing to grow independently of others. Will he be able to release his true power living this way?
dictionary.evolution:
How ironic.
To think that my partner this time
would make me stronger instead.
dictionary.fusion:
Hmph, fine. I don't care.
As long as it makes me stronger.
I should thank you...I guess...
dictionary.summon:
I can't deny your ability.
But I'll only get even stronger.
Not for my past, but for the future.

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効＆ＢＢ発動時のＢＢゲージの消費量を軽減
leader skill.name: 永遠の覇気

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性２０連ダメージ（確率で敵の残りＨＰの１０％ダメージ）＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを軽減
sbb.name: リゲル・レゾナンス

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: 真空水月斬

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加・ＨＰを少し回復
leader skill.name: 愛に時間を

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復＆３ターン、攻撃に水属性を付与
bb.name: ウンディーネ

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加・ＨＰを少し回復
leader skill.name: 愛に時間を

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に水・樹属性を付与
bb.name: スプラッシュゲイル

dictionary.description: A pirate that sailed the seas before the prosperity of the Sama pirates, instilling fear in every town near the coast. Said to be originally from the Agni Region, much of her personal life remains unknown. She is said to have been the one to write the Pirate's Code, and to have laid the foundation for the pirate era. Many legends are attributed to her, including one in which she has a life-threatening battle with a gigantic sea creature. This story is so popular that it was made into a motion picture, making it a famous tale even amongst the children of this age.
dictionary.fusion:
This just won't do.
You'll have to work harder
while you're under my command!
dictionary.summon:
I will acknowledge the courage
it took to summon me here.
Now you'll have to prove your strength.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの最大ＨＰを１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 王者の天啓

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に水・樹属性を付与
bb.name: ブルーストーム

dictionary.description: An ancient Pirate Queen of Legend. Most of her wild exploits took place in the Palmyna Archipelago, but she was forced to move her headquarters to Agni when the decline of the Amdahl empire seemed imminent. Many legends tell of her pastime of toying with the Agni Knights, who were not used to sea battles. It is also said that her ship sailed without oar nor wind, with rumors stating that behind her stood gigantic tentacles at all times. This may be a strong indication that even squid were terrified of her.
dictionary.evolution:
Not bad! Well done.
Guess that's why you're my
newest crew member!
dictionary.fusion:
Tsk, pathetic.
Put your back into it!
I won't let you rest
until I'm satisfied with your work!
dictionary.summon:
Are you my new crew member?
I leave my old crew mates
in your capable hands!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の天啓

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に水・樹属性を付与
bb.name: ブルーヴァンキッシュ

dictionary.description: An ancient Pirate Queen mentioned in many legends. With various pirate crews under her command, she was feared even by the sea demons themselves. It is written that once it had been revealed that the mad emperor of Agni had been imprisoned due to a curse, she was arrested. The conditions of her release were set as appeasing the vengeful spirit of the emperor in exchange for her freedom, but since it's improbable that they would free her while she knew the emperor's dark secret, this account is considered fictional by many.
dictionary.evolution:
I'm so excited now!
You are too, aren't ya?!
I'll crush the gods and everything else!
dictionary.fusion:
No need to be so tense!
I'll get stronger both for you,
and for me!
dictionary.summon:
Does my origin really matter?
If I said I was the emperor's love child,
would things be different?

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆被ダメージ時、確率でＨＰを少し回復
leader skill.name: 幻魔神の天啓

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力をかなりアップ・攻撃に水・樹属性を付与
sbb.name: エンドヴォルティチェ

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復＆１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: アクアリブラ

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Tesla, a member of Randall Empire's "Imperial Guard." She is under the command of Eriole, the leader of her division. Putting Eriole's plans in motion from the shadows, she rarely shows herself. Because of this, there are many members of the Guard who do not speak with her. However, her presence is such that when she makes an appearance, everyone understands that a very important mission is about to commence.
dictionary.fusion:
I do not need assistance from
a Summoner. I will only bare my fangs
for Lord Eriole's sake.
dictionary.summon:
.......
Not only are you trying to take my light, but
you're also trying to rob me of my soul?

leader skill.desc: 水・光属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 帝国の力

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復＆１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: アクアフォート

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Tesla, Eriole's aide. Both Tesla and Eriole hail from the same orphanage, having lived as siblings until each of them was adopted by a foster family. Various circumstances prompted their reunion afterwards, leading Tesla to become Eriole's shadow in order to provide continuous support. She developed abilities far greater than anyone in the whole nation for Eriole's sake, and will only wield them for his sake alone.
dictionary.evolution:
Being with you reminds me
of those days. We were poor,
but we were happy.
Lord Eriole, I...
dictionary.fusion:
I shall accept your power.
All in the name of Lord Eriole.
dictionary.summon:
I shall turn the path you seek
into the path Eriole seeks.
That is my current duty.

leader skill.desc: 水・光属性ユニットの攻撃力・防御力・回復力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 帝国の威光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１８連ダメージ＆３ターン、自分のスパークダメージをかなりアップ・クリティカル率を超絶アップ
sbb.name: リベル・アストライア

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性９連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力・防御力を１ターン低下
bb.name: アケローン

dictionary.description: A disciple who descended to Bariura in order to seal an ancient dragon. It is said that she did not intend to save the human race by doing this, but rather, to preserve the order and balance of the world. At the same time, Grand Gaia was battling against the 12 Guardians of the Gods after the deities had decided to destroy humankind. However, many speculate that Belfura felt that the dragon was a much more imminent threat. Some say that behind her always stood a dormant snow and thunder dragon she had sealed with her powers.
dictionary.fusion:
A human lending me power?!
Ugh, how humiliating...
You will pay for this someday.
dictionary.summon:
I know not the future of humans.
But chaos cannot be tolerated.
I shall help you.

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
leader skill.name: 悪疫の波紋

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１２連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力・防御力を１ターン低下
bb.name: アヴェルナス

dictionary.description: A disciple who descended to Bariura in order to seal an ancient dragon. Having reached the land where the dragon rampaged, she sensed two other kinds of power besides the dangerous creature. She headed towards the sources of power at full speed only to find a former friend who had betrayed the gods, and thus fallen out of grace. Seeing two humans standing with her former friend, she attacked them without remorse. It was only after several hours of fighting that she acknowledged the will of her opponents, finally laying her sword to rest.
dictionary.evolution:
What did you do...?
The power of the dragon I sealed
is growing stronger and stronger...
dictionary.fusion:
Fine, I'll take it.
After all, those with a strong will
always have a good purpose behind it.
dictionary.summon:
If you are trustworthy,
race matters not!
I shall fight with you
alongside my loyal dragon!

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
leader skill.name: 悪疫の蔓延

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１５連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力・防御力を１ターン低下
bb.name: ステュクス

dictionary.description: A disciple who descended to Bariura in order to seal an ancient dragon. After joining a group of humans to defeat the ancient dragon, she warned them against the demonic presence that accompanied their mutual enemy. It is said that Belfura's confidence in her own powers had a strong influence in Arus's mentality at the time. Once they had reached the battlefield, she entrusted the dragon to the humans while she faced the other demon on her own. She used her strong conviction to fight against the calamity that had now completely escaped its seal.
dictionary.evolution:
Ancient Dragon Rhaegar!
My sworn and loyal friend,
I command you to release your true power!
dictionary.fusion:
What a peculiar human.
You remind me of those honest people.
Hmph, how unlike me to say that...
dictionary.summon:
Life as a human.
No matter how difficult it may be,
higher beings should've sympathized.

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生＆スパークダメージを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 悪疫神の重激

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１８連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力・防御力を１ターン低下＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加
sbb.name: グレイシアドラグーン

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１２連ダメージ
bb.name: ブラッディローズ

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ・ＨＣ・ゼル出現率をアップ＆ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 守護慈愛の天使

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: トリックスター

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ・ＨＣ・ゼル出現率をアップ＆ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 守護慈愛の天使

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: ブラッディローズ・極

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ＆・ゼル出現率を大幅にアップ＆ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: レンズハンター

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をアップ
sbb.name: トリックスター・極

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復・全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
bb.name: ソウルアルケミー

dictionary.description: The most historically renowned alchemist. Unable to determine the date and region where he once lived, it was formerly believed that all of his great scientific accomplishments could not be attributed to one alchemist alone, and thus he was considered mere fiction. However, when a certain demonic tool's existence was proven, his existence was confirmed along with it. Rigness was not the typical alchemist who trapped himself in his laboratory, but rather set off in many adventures to collect rare materials for his research.
dictionary.fusion:
Are these ingredients?
Just leave them there.
I'll fuse them myself.
What? I can't do that?
dictionary.summon:
What is it? I'm busy at the moment.
If you simply wish to chat,
please leave it for another time.

leader skill.desc: 全ての状態異常にかなりかかりにくくなる
leader skill.name: 青浄の光風

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復・全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
bb.name: ミストエレクシア

dictionary.description: The most historically renowned alchemist. Not the typical alchemist who trapped himself in his laboratory, Rigness often set off in many adventures to collect rare materials for his research. Most of the rare materials used to create various items today were named by Rigness himself. Not only that, but he is also said to have gathered lots of information about unknown monsters dwelling in the depths of unexplored regions, recently gaining him fame as a magic wielding adventurer as well. To him, even a monster was a treasure trove of valuable materials.
dictionary.evolution:
The use of this type of magic
is very interesting indeed...
When you double that,
this happens...
dictionary.fusion:
I see now.
You add this to this...
Then that to that...
Oh, your assistance isn't needed.
dictionary.summon:
Hmm? These materials you have...
Could you please show them to me?
Just for a moment?

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効
leader skill.name: 蒼穹の神風

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
bb.name: ジェネレクション

dictionary.description: The most historically renowned alchemist. While Rigness traveled to different regions in order to gather materials, it is said that he discovered the descendants of some otherworldly race dwelling within some ruins. However, since the ruins where full of perilous creatures, his magic had to grow stronger in order to continue his research. It was at this point when he created his famous demon tool capable of avoiding any calamities, and discovered the existence of these otherworldly beings. This is considered to be the fruit of all of his long years of research.
dictionary.evolution:
It looks like I can finally
take the next step forward.
Thank you for all your help.
dictionary.fusion:
You make an excellent assistant.
Well, the next materials I require--
Hey! Where are you going?
dictionary.summon:
Oh, it's been a while.
Wait, or have we just met?
You're my new assistant, correct?

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効＆ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復
leader skill.name: 永遠の天啓

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎・水・樹・雷属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
sbb.name: ロストマテリアル

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをアップ
bb.name: フォーカロール

dictionary.description: A wandering disciple with no real master. It is speculated that he had once sworn service to a certain god, but that god's name has been lost to history. There are also rumors which state that he inherited all of his powers from his former master, making his abilities equal to those of a high ranking god. Forever a free spirit, Tazer refused to take orders from the gods, always acting on his own accord. This caused many gods to view him as a threat to the stability of their practices. Nowadays Tazer's name can only be found in a handful of legends passed down through the ages.
dictionary.fusion:
Stop telling me what to do.
I'll help you out,
but I'll do it my way.
dictionary.summon:
A Summoner, huh...?
I don't like this one bit.
Don't tell me what to do.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の閃光

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ
bb.name: ネレイドライヴ

dictionary.description: A wandering disciple with no real master. The only one true friend Tazer had incurred the wrath of Afla Dilith, who then absorbed his precious companion. After learning of his friend's death, Tazer tossed aside his usual calm and cool composure to go after Afla Dilith. He was successful in recovering the power that had been stolen from his friend when battling the Fallen God, but an interruption from the disciple Zurg left him no other choice but to flee. As he ran from his pursuer hoping his wounds would heal, he was approached by a higher ranking god who guided him forth.
dictionary.evolution:
This is the power of friendship.
Though the physical body is gone,
my friend's soul still remains.
dictionary.fusion:
Looks like I've gotten used to
my friend's power now...
But is there more to tap into...?
dictionary.summon:
I serve no one.
The only reason why I'm helping you
is because we have a common enemy.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを７５％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の神光

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な水属性１７連ダメージ＆自分のＢＢゲージを満タンにする＆３ターン、自分のスパークダメージをアップ
sbb.name: サージヴァニッシュ

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ
bb.name: オービタルブレイズ

dictionary.description: A disciple who was sealed in Ishgria. Having run into a barrier created by a higher ranking god, Tazer was attacked by a thunder wielding disciple. He used his friend's power, which he had just recovered from Afla Dilith, and managed to deal with the assault. However, another disciple attacked him promptly afterwards, stating that the situation they were in was a competition meant to select a disciple worthy of more power. Though suspicious of the disciple's words, Tazer jumped into the battlefield regardless, unaware that he would ultimately be sealed where he stood.
dictionary.evolution:
I didn't choose to master power,
but the things that come with it!
I beat my friend to that one.
dictionary.fusion:
You wanna make me stronger?
Then I'll make it up to you!
I'll even risk my life to do it!
dictionary.summon:
No one believes in gods anymore.
I only believe in the friend who fought
with me, and in you.

extra skill.desc: ＢＢゲージが満タン時、攻撃力をかなりアップ
extra skill.name: 英明なる魔導師の力

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを７５％アップ＆ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 閃統神の煌火

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な水属性１９連ダメージ＆自分のＢＢゲージを満タンにする＆３ターン、自分のスパークダメージをかなりアップ
sbb.name: アルブディフュージョン

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な水属性２２連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与＆３ターン、スパークダメージを超絶アップ
ubb.name: エーギル・カラミティ

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: グラス・グレール

dictionary.description: One of the sacred Guardians of Meirith, who worshipped the Holy Emperor Karna Masta in the La Veda Republic. He is the younger twin brother of Claire, who also served as a Guardian. Taking great pride in being chosen by the gods themselves, Colt was always abrasive, but said to be gentle to the defenseless. He had a strong dislike for Quaid, another one of the Guardians. However, it is speculated that these feelings came as a form of jealousy that sprouted from the deep bond he shared with his twin sister. Curiously, he was also known to dislike small animals.
dictionary.fusion:
You don't need to tell me I'm strong.
I already knew that.
You got anything else to say?
dictionary.summon:
You unworthy thing summoned me here?
I don't have a choice, so I'll stay,
but don't get any ideas.

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージを大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の覇刃

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: グラス・アルジェント

dictionary.description: One of the sacred Guardians of Meirith. Before he was ordered to become a Guardian, he served as a knight of La Veda alongside his elder twin sister, Claire. However, he was considered a liability on the battlefield, and grew infamous amongst his peers. He was later bestowed with a blade of ice by Karna Masta himself, and sent to Ishgria on a demon slaying mission with the other Guardians. Completely different from his time as a knight, he learned how to best judge his choices on the battlefield, and protected his sister whilst in action. It is said he gradually became so powerful that he could even match the strength of a demon.
dictionary.evolution:
My evolution was inevitable.
I'm genuinely strong.
Just as strong as my sister.
dictionary.fusion:
There's no gap between him and I!
But I'll make sure to make one
by becoming even more powerful!
dictionary.summon:
I won't look down on you, promise.
But it's just that you're nothing
compared to my sis.

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージを大幅にアップ＆全てのユニットの回復力・最大ＨＰを１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の冥加

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ・ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
sbb.name: 雹奏『ヘイルヴリズン』

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を超絶アップ・ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: グラス・イズベルグ

dictionary.description: When Colt received word that a group of dissenters sought to destroy the Holy Emperor, he asked his partners to return to Grand Gaia with him. However, the group split up into factions, and only him, his sister, and Fadahl went back. Once home, Colt battled against those who meant to slay Karna Masta, but exhausted from his previous mission, soon found himself unable to release his full power. It is said that Claire fell trying to protect her brother, leaving her last words to him. However, he had already been at peace when he heard them, and never moved again.
dictionary.evolution:
I don't need anything else.
Power nor kindness.
Yet, I still find myself here.
dictionary.fusion:
Now I'll fight for you because
you've acknowledged my strength.
I'll keep pressing forward too.
dictionary.summon:
What do you think of me?
I'm neither strong, nor kind.
I'm just a weakling...

extra skill.desc: 「氷晶神剣サリュオン」を装備時、または、パーティ内に「クレア」がいると戦闘中に攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
extra skill.name: 紅槍の絆

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージを大幅にアップ＆全てのユニットの回復力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の天佑

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を超絶アップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
sbb.name: 氷空旋『ヘイルクルセイド』

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な水属性２１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を超絶アップ・攻撃力を超絶アップ
ubb.name: レクスグラキエース

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性５連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力を１ターン低下
bb.name: タイドストライク

dictionary.description: A type of sea dragon native to Ishgria known for its beautiful fins. Though it very seldom shows itself in front of others, its high intellect allows it to even communicate with humans. Having the best balance of brains and brawn amongst all of the aquatic creatures of Ishgria, its calm nature leads it to avoid any surrounding conflicts. However, when these conflicts threaten its life, it fights bravely and relentlessly, showing a very different side of its nature.
dictionary.fusion:
My power is growing...
It's all thanks to you, correct?
You have my gratitude.
dictionary.summon:
You are a Summoner, correct?
Having been summoned here must've
been the work of fate as well.

leader skill.desc: カルマ出現率を超絶アップ
leader skill.name: 魂の気勢

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性８連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力を１ターン低下
bb.name: ウェルテクスシザーズ

dictionary.description: A type of sea dragon native to Ishgria known for its beautiful fins. Since it has never been seen preying upon other animals, it is believed that it restores its energy through the various minerals it keeps stored in its body. Known to enjoy swimming leisurely in the light, it can also cause great maelstroms and whirling tides in the sea when seriously infuriated. Though it is originally a creature from the sea, some have been known to come ashore secluded places to bathe in the light of the full moon.
dictionary.evolution:
I can feel powerful waves within
myself. Could it be...?
Have I evolved?
dictionary.fusion:
I've become even stronger.
I would like to return the favor
in the near future...
dictionary.summon:
I shall lend you a hand.
If you use my powers for good,
that is...

leader skill.desc: カルマ出現率を超絶アップ
leader skill.name: 魂の気勢

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力に応じて攻撃力を少しアップ
bb.name: アズールクロス

dictionary.description: A knight who swore allegiance to the third prince of the Sama Kingdom, Arius. Lionel grew up beside the prince, and the two bonded through the sword training they would occasionally do together. Arius placed a great deal of trust in Lionel, and tasked him with such errands as delivering his letters to Selena. As the great war against the gods drew closer, Lionel was ready to fight for Arius when he suddenly disappeared. The loss of Lionel is said to have left Arius devastated, but might have also helped him grow more independent.
dictionary.fusion:
I need to grow stronger in order to
fight by Prince Arius's side...
Please, help me reach my goal!
dictionary.summon:
Did you summon me here?
I like your style.
Let's fight together!
For Prince Arius!

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが少ないほど、攻撃力をアップ
leader skill.name: 剣士の志

bb.desc: 敵単体に水属性９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力に応じて攻撃力をアップ
bb.name: クラージュブレイド

dictionary.description: A knight from the Sama Kingdom who lived during the times of the great war. Lionel was left for dead after his disappearance during the battle against the God Army, but recent developments show that he was swallowed by a dimensional vortex leading to Ishgria which appeared in the midst of battle. Though he had his hands full fighting off fearsome beasts and demons in a strange land, Lionel never stopped worrying about Arius, and kept searching for a way to return to him in Grand Gaia. However, it seems he was unable to fulfill his wishes in the end.
dictionary.evolution:
The battlefield has helped me grow.
How I would have loved for Prince
Arius to have seen me thus...
dictionary.fusion:
Wait for me, my prince!
I shall grow stronger, and aid you
with my sword in battle!
dictionary.summon:
My blade belongs to Prince Arius!
But if you do not require an oath,
then I can lend you a hand.

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが少ないほど、攻撃力をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 剣豪の闘志

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性２３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: レド・ブロウ

dictionary.description: An ancient dragon with the force of the ocean within itself. Its birth is rumored to be so ancient that it is believed to have been as old as the land itself. According to legend, it overflowed the oceans many a time to kill all living creatures on land, leading many to believe its rampage had a direct impact in forging Ishgria into the world of demons.  However, other tales claim Rubeus rampaged in Grand Gaia as well, something scholars have yet to explain.
dictionary.fusion:
The force of mere ripples...
What a useless power...
dictionary.summon:
Ignorant child...
I shall teach you
the true meaning of fear...

leader skill.desc: 炎・水属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 水炎の結界

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性２５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: レド・クエイク

dictionary.description: An ancient dragon which once rampaged about Ishgria. Rigdila was said to be feared even by the most powerful of demons. Therefore, it is believed that the great ocean of Ishgria was once ruled by this dragon at some point. However, a demon seeking to gain more territory used many mechanical weapons to challenge Rigdila, driving it away from the region. The best example of the intensity of this battle is perhaps best exemplified by the transfiguring marks it left on the coastline.
dictionary.evolution:
My soul is wailing...
Even if you try to destroy me...
My grudge will always bring me back...
dictionary.fusion:
When two waves crash,
they gradually become bigger...
This power is nothing to boast of...
dictionary.summon:
A darkness as deep as the sea...
There is no light in your future...
That is what intrigues me...

leader skill.desc: 炎・水属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減＆スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 護水炎の闘輝

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性３０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ・ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
sbb.name: ディスラプション

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性２８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: レド・アルディナ

dictionary.description: An ancient dragon feared by even demons themselves. Once defeated, the great dragon was confined to the depths of the ocean until its wounds had healed. When it made its appearance once again, the sea swallowed a great number of demons in an instant. However, the demon who had beaten it before reappeared as well, ensuing into a long battle. In the end, all of Zerafalgar's four limbs were picked apart and destroyed by this machine-like demon. And though this demon had also suffered grave injuries, Zerafalgar subsequently entered a deep sleep in order to seek revenge in the future.
dictionary.evolution:
Both the wrath and gentleness
of the ocean live within me...
For I am its ruler...
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel the breath of life...
Summoner, did you say
you can quell my anger...?
dictionary.summon:
Whosoever manages to destroy me...
Will transcend life itself...
And lead humans into darkness...

extra skill.desc: 通常攻撃時、ＢＢゲージを大幅に増加
extra skill.name: 原始の大海

leader skill.desc: 炎・水属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減＆スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 護水炎の閃光

20606.name: 崩瀑神龍ゼラファーガ

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性３２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ・ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
sbb.name: グランディスラプション

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な水属性４０連ダメージ＆攻撃力を１ターン大幅に低下＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で攻撃力を１ターン超絶低下する効果を付与
ubb.name: アルゲオ・ボレアース

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１２連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加
bb.name: ブラーゼフロウ

dictionary.description: A warrior who once fought against the gods alongside the Oracle Knight. Her ability to manipulate beautiful sea pearls with her sword dancing was so exceptional that it is said she was next in line to take over the role of Oracle Knight. However, the Oracle Maiden that she was so close to thought Medina too weak, and chose a different warrior from the Sama Kingdom to take the role of Oracle Knight. Prepared to have sacrificed anything in the name of the Oracle Maiden, Medina felt doubt and disappointment when she was refused by the same, though she remained to protect her dear friend regardless.
dictionary.fusion:
Have I gained new powers?
If I could just become stronger
to protect that child...
dictionary.summon:
Were you the one to summon me here?
Can you fill the great hole
that lies deep within my heart?

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の威光

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１４連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加
bb.name: ブラーゼフラッド

dictionary.description: Failing to be appointed as the Oracle Knight, Medina continued honing her skills with the sword in order to overcome her own disappointment. Later on, Medina decided to apply for the role of Oracle Knight once again when she received a peculiar request. The current Oracle Knight and the Oracle Maiden asked Medina to lend them her power against the gods who sought to destroy humanity. Though she had not been expecting such a request, she decided to tag along in order to judge with her very own eyes whether or not the current Oracle Knight was really worthy of such a title.
dictionary.evolution:
Thank you...but it won't suffice.
I must become stronger...
In order to be by her side...
dictionary.fusion:
The stronger I am, the better
guardian I become! I'll use all my
power to protect that girl!
dictionary.summon:
I'm not strong enough?
Yes, I know.
What I truly lack is...

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の覇光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１６連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを超絶増加＆味方全体に３ターン、被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
sbb.name: アプサラス・ブレス

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１６連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加
bb.name: ブラーゼストリーム

dictionary.description: When the grievous battle against the gods began, Medina was always fighting at the frontlines. Even before the strongest of enemies, Medina used countless techniques of the highest skill in order to protect the Oracle Maiden. However, being at the frontlines presented a great danger, and the powerful swing of one of the gods managed to severely injure Medina in the midst of battle. As she lay there losing consciousness, prepared to die, she heard the voice of the man she so despised say "Being protected in return once in a while can't be that bad, right?"
dictionary.evolution:
What I lacked back then
was not strength alone.
I feel as if I finally see it now!
dictionary.fusion:
Strength builds confidence!
No matter who my opponent may be,
I will stand and fight fearlessly!
dictionary.summon:
Was I protecting her?
Or was she protecting me?
I wonder what that guy would say...

extra skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
extra skill.name: 高潔なる水珠

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をかなりアップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 戦神の脈動

20616.name: 湊珠の瞬閃神メディナ

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１８連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを超絶増加＆味方全体に３ターン、被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
sbb.name: アプサラス・ロウラ

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な水属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力を超絶アップ＆１ターン、被ダメージを１/４に軽減
ubb.name: 湊流覇導『エクシディア』

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、被ダメージ時、確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生する効果を付与
bb.name: アトリーズ

dictionary.description: An ocean knight from another world. Said to have come from a world where demons and pixies are more powerful than humans, Vernil had sworn his fealty to its king. Not only did he ride a horse which could gallop over water, but he himself was admired as a mighty knight for his skills with the lance and his ability to use magic by manipulating the spirits of the dead. One day he was given orders to look into a certain disaster that had happened far away at sea. During his mission he reported to have found an enormous hole on the surface of the ocean, and subsequently vanished from that world.
dictionary.fusion:
A knight never neglects training,
no matter what. Training is even
more imperative during peace.
dictionary.summon:
Another strange world.
Please tell me whom
I should pledge my service to.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを７５％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の神光

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、被ダメージ時、確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生する効果を付与
bb.name: ヒルドールヴ

dictionary.description: An ocean knight from another world. After being swallowed by the giant whole he found in the ocean of his home world, Vernil surfaced in the oceans of Grand Gaia. Fortunately, he was saved by a Siren and managed to get an audience with the king of all oceanic fauna. Faced with the harsh truth surrounding his inability to return home, he decided to pledge his allegiance to the king of all oceanic fauna in this new world instead of submitting to despair. It is said that the king valued his ability and honesty to such an extent that he entrusted Vernil with the safety of his precious daughter, the princess.
dictionary.evolution:
I've received the grace of the king.
I shall keep fighting
to repay his kindness someday.
dictionary.fusion:
Someone is always supporting me.
And it is thanks to that person
that I can continue moving forth.
dictionary.summon:
The power to put the soul at rest.
I believe the princess held it.
It's why heroes befriended her.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを７５％アップ＆確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
leader skill.name: 閃統神の波紋

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力をかなりアップ・被ダメージ時、確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生する効果を付与
sbb.name: グロスヴァーグ

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、被ダメージ時、確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生する効果を付与
bb.name: スキルヴィング

dictionary.description: An ocean knight from another world. It is said that the king of all oceanic fauna was having a really hard time thanks to a demon that had appeared in the depths of the sea. Vernil set off to vanquish that demon, hoping that the gate where the demon had come from would act as a passage to return him to his home world. He then left Grand Gaia, and once he had passed through the gate, he continued to fight the demon in Ishgria. Afterwards, he slayed many other demons there as well, but is said to have found no peace of mind in the end.
dictionary.evolution:
This great ocean is my battlefield!
I will show you such power
that transcends these raging waves!
dictionary.fusion:
Those peaceful days will not return.
I shall focus on my training
to distance myself from my past!
dictionary.summon:
Instead of repaying his kindness,
I only hoped to return home.
These fights are now my punishment.

extra skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ
extra skill.name: 平安無き戦意

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを７５％アップ＆確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
leader skill.name: 閃統神の蔓延

20626.name: 鎗駆崇神帝ヴェルニル

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力をかなりアップ・被ダメージ時、確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生する効果を付与
sbb.name: ハール・グロスヴァーグ

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な水属性ダメージ＆１ターン、自分のスパークダメージを超絶アップ＆味方全体に３ターン、被ダメージ時、全状態異常をランダムに発生する効果を付与
ubb.name: アインヘリヤル

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に炎・水属性を付与＆２ターン、炎・樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを少し軽減
bb.name: 氷刻の棘

dictionary.description: A Summoner who joined the Akras Summoners' Hall from its first days of establishment. While working as a civil official for the Randall Empire, she was one day accused of being a spy for the Elgaia Federation, and was subsequently relieved from her post. And although her innocence was proved almost immediately afterwards, it is believed that this was the reason why she chose to join the Hall. There were many other Summoners who wondered why a civil official like her boasted of such high combat abilities despite just having joined the Hall, but she had nothing to say about it.
dictionary.fusion:
Huh? Did something just happen?
But it wasn't so...
Never mind.
dictionary.summon:
I'm happy to be needed.
But the reason why you need my power,
is not one I'm happy about...

leader skill.desc: ガード時のダメージ軽減率をアップ＆ガード成立時、ＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 覇王の聖護壁

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に炎・水属性を付与＆２ターン、炎・樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを少し軽減
bb.name: 氷霊の鋭棘

dictionary.description: The former commander of the now defunct 5th Squadron of the Demon Slayers. No information regarding the location of Iris's exploits in Grand Gaia was left behind. It is actually believed that such information was purposely erased, and that even the Summoners of Old don't know all the facts behind her story. Some stories claim that once when she was surveying a certain sanctuary, she learned a shocking truth about the great war with the gods. Though there isn't enough evidence to support this, it is said that she was able to do so because she summoned the dead souls of the 12 Guardians of the Gods.
dictionary.evolution:
This weird feeling within me...
It waned a little.
Did you have anything to do with it?
dictionary.fusion:
Well, this isn't so bad.
What happens next?
Oh, don't take that the wrong way.
dictionary.summon:
I like Summoners...
But also,
I guess I kinda don't...

leader skill.desc: ガード時のダメージ軽減率をアップ＆ガード成立時、ＢＢゲージを増加＆確率で被ダメージを２０％軽減
leader skill.name: 統神の聖護壁

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な水属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で攻撃力・防御力を１ターン低下する効果を付与・攻撃に炎・水属性を付与＆２ターン、炎・樹属性からの被ダメージを少し軽減
sbb.name: カルト・ドルン

bb.desc: 敵全体に水属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に炎・水属性を付与＆２ターン、炎・樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを少し軽減
bb.name: 氷閻の刃棘

dictionary.description: A Summoner selected to join the covert "Ishgria's Recon Squad." After the squadron separated itself from its commander, it faced the sudden attack of a dangerous creature, and all members got dispersed. Iris was left completely isolated, though after surveying the land she came across a being that called herself a goddess. That was the last time anyone heard from her. Furthermore, it was Iris who carried most of the detailed reports concerning the findings her squad had made in Ishgria, so the whereabouts of such reports remain a mystery.
dictionary.evolution:
So this is evolution... I see...
Thank you, I finally understand...
Let me fight with you...
dictionary.fusion:
Yes, this is very good.
If I had to compare it something...
Oh, I don't think I have the words...
dictionary.summon:
My beliefs will never change...
But I did try switching camps.
The outcome is...a secret...

extra skill.desc: 通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数を増加
extra skill.name: 不変の願いと変わる心

dictionary.description: The disciple who discovered the power of the Nine Sacred Treasures. Due to his betrayal against the gods, all records having to do with Quartz were erased as his punishment, including those which showed the name of the god he served. Though not many accounts about him remain after his persecution into Ishgria, by connecting what little information does exist researchers have gathered that it was Quartz who discovered the nine dormant powers of Grand Gaia, acquiring two of them for himself. Nowadays it is also speculated that it was him who gave the Nine Sacred Treasures their names.
dictionary.fusion:
Living beings grow with experience,
but summoning is different.
It's quite the strange art.
dictionary.summon:
Why are you looking for me?
Are you after my knowledge?
Well, not like it matters.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの最大ＨＰを３０％アップ

bb.name: アドヴァースビロウ

dictionary.description: The disciple who discovered the power of the Nine Sacred Treasures. The Sacred Treasures did not originally hold any divine power, and were not meant to be given to humans either. Quartz gave each treasure a name based on the ambiguous power they possessed, later giving them to humans of his choosing. However, this incurred the wrath of the gods, who punished him by exiling him to Ishgria. Quartz found this a delight though, believing that the key to helping the power of Sacred Treasures to flourish lay within this mysterious land.
dictionary.evolution:
I don't care about evolving.
I only care about my treasures.
Do you have any of them?
dictionary.fusion:
Growing stronger without experience.
I just may be defying
the very laws of nature.
dictionary.summon:
An object comes to existence
the moment you name it.
This also sets its value.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復

bb.name: アドヴァースカタラクト

dictionary.description: The disciple who discovered the power of the Nine Sacred Treasures. After Quartz imbued the Sacred Treasures with mysterious powers, they began to grow with the help of the demonic power found in the lands of Ishgria. Using these powers Quartz was able to return home, promptly renaming all the treasures again and scattering them across Grand Gaia. It is said he told every human who received one to keep the existence of their respective treasure a secret, but the reason for this remains unclear. It wasn't until some of the treasure bearers began speaking of the sacred items he had named and left behind that their history resurfaced.
dictionary.evolution:
So the treasures evolved too?
I guess I should thank you
for helping me evolve as well.
dictionary.fusion:
Fusion is quite handy.
However, it still can't be compared
to the power of the Sacred Treasures.
dictionary.summon:
My intentions aren't bad.
But treasure drives men mad.
It must be strictly regulated.

dictionary.description: A captain of the Sorcerer’s Army from another world guided by the Chain Chronicle. She is a “sealer,” meaning her body is covered in magic seals which allow her to use magic freely even in melee combat. A magic warrior originally molded to concern herself only with following orders from her master, she first began developing more complex emotions after joining the Volunteer Army. Though she is aware that this "inefficient behavior" is not part of her original design, her mentality is changing in favor of expressing such emotions outside the battlefield.
dictionary.fusion:
My apologies.
The function used to express my
uncomfortability is faulty.
dictionary.summon:
I must follow your every order.
That is what my superiors told me.

dictionary.description: A captain of the Sorcerer’s Army from another world guided by the Chain Chronicle. Capable of piercing enemies from great distances with her magic, as well as freezing them with a swing of her blade in a matter of seconds, Yuni excels in every aspect of combat. However, unfamiliar with how to express most human emotions, she has the tendency of acting like she's ready for a fight whenever she carries out any type of order. On the other hand, because she never tires emotionally during battle, she is considered to be the new generation of rational soldier.
dictionary.evolution:
It would seem both my strength and
my magical powers have increased.
It must be what you call "evolution."
dictionary.fusion:
You've no need to worry about me.
I am a magic warrior.
I will fight until I break.
dictionary.summon:
To kill the enemy,
not to kill the enemy.
All it takes is an order from you
to make either happen.

bb.name: キュアノスグレイヴ

dictionary.description: The queen of Estria and leader of a national alliance in Ancient Ishgria. In olden times, there was a demon ruler in Ishgria which encouraged other demons to fight each other in order to gain enormous power. However, by the time Savia had gained the same leadership position, she had grown tired of all the endless fighting. It was then when the new and innovative nation of Mildran made its appearance, defeating countless demons along the way.
dictionary.fusion:
This is so tedious.
Can't you do this
in a better fashion somehow?
dictionary.summon:
A world full of insolent beings
would not be missed, don't you agree?
Why do I bother with this struggle?

bb.name: キュアノスインペリア

dictionary.description: The rise of Mildran was considered a threat by traditional demons who hated the idea of being ruled. Therefore, those very demons who considered Savia their leader decided to repel the invasion from Mildran. This caused both nations to engage in a great number of battles, which eventually culminated in a duel between both nation's rulers. It is rumored that no one was allowed near either one of them during their fight. In the end Savia was determined the victor, as she had stopped the invasion of her country, but she is said to have remained silent and vigilant amidst all the ruckus.
dictionary.evolution:
An interesting twist of fate allowed
for him to help me better myself.
What will you do for me?
dictionary.fusion:
The Summoner's "Fusion" technique.
It may not be fun, but it has its
merits. I shall allow it for now.
dictionary.summon:
Foolish hearts ache for war
under the leadership of others.
Are you somewhat different?

bb.name: キュアノスドミニオン

dictionary.description: After having stopped the invasion from Mildran, Savia made an  alliance with Adel, Mildran's king. She then proclaimed that all senseless fighting would be prohibited in order to unify Ishgria. The demons who were unhappy with this idea persuaded the king and queen's subordinates to rebel against them, leading to their relentless persecution. And though both Savia and Adel were demons of great power and ability, their whereabouts after this incident remain unknown. Savia's confidant, who had always watched over her, is said to have disappeared as well. Apparently, it was Savia and Adel's wish that she live a normal life instead.
dictionary.evolution:
I can feel it in you as well.
I can feel what you call the future.
And I guess I don't mind it.
dictionary.fusion:
My power is yours.
Do as you wish with it.
I grant you my consent.
dictionary.summon:
Adaptation is part of every
creature's primal instinct. However,
I only wish for her happiness...

bb.name: アキュート・ラム

dictionary.description: A maiden considered so dangerous that she had to be imprisoned. Hailing from a prodigious family from which a number of the Twelve Guardians of the Gods originated, Lune's cousin was none other than the destructive Luly. However, unlike her famous cousin, Lune's demonic powers grew too large to control, and thus she was sealed in the basement of her own estate along with her powers. Many of her relatives would then die fighting in the great war against the gods, which allowed Lune to physically break free, along with her hatred.
dictionary.fusion:
I don't care...
As long as it actually helps...
But you're pretty stubborn...
dictionary.summon:
Fine... I'll fight with you...
Don't have a reason why though...
As long as we destroy together...

leader skill.name: 覇王の力

bb.name: フローリック・ラム

dictionary.description: A maiden feared by both gods and men alike. The first thing Lune did once she broke free of her prison was destroy her hometown. Afterwards, she cared not for the difference between gods and humans, and continued to mercilessly destroy anyone not to her liking. Growing more insane by the minute, she began to feel like Elgaia was calling out to her, prompting her to head towards the fleeing refugees on their way there. Ironically, the chaos that resulted from Lune's abrupt appearance actually helped to buy the humans more time to escape.
dictionary.evolution:
It doesn't matter if I'm free...
There's nothing I want to do...
I hate everyone...
dictionary.fusion:
You wanna play with me?
Fine, let's play...
But don't crumble too fast, okay...?
dictionary.summon:
I've no expectations for this world.
Especially not for humans...
Gods and men alike should be crushed.

bb.name: ジスフォリア・ラム

dictionary.description: A maiden feared by the demons themselves. According to recently found data, Lune disappeared to Ishgria in the midst of her battle against the God Army. Her exceptional demonic and destructive powers allowed her to adapt to Ishgria fairly easily. A witch who surfaced in Grand Gaia even mentioned Lune's battles against other demons in her memoirs. No one knows what ultimately became of this maiden bent on destruction, but legend has it that eventually there was no one left who could go against her.
dictionary.evolution:
What? You wanna play with me?
What should we play then?
Will you stay until you fall apart?
dictionary.fusion:
You're making me stronger?
You're weird.
But it's not like I hate you... I...
dictionary.summon:
It's not like I like violence...
I just hate a lot of things...
She's always playing, but I...

bb.name: スウォールサーノ

dictionary.description: A fairy whose form changed into a flower. Originally, fairies like Piany were very common and abundant in Grand Gaia. However, most of them were turned into flowers as they absorbed the power of demon crystals in order to help the disease ridden Vriksha Duchy. These miraculous flowers saved many people, but the terrible power from the demon crystals remained trapped within the flowers that had been left intact. Piany then began changing from a sweet fairy into a demon under the influence of this malevolent power.
dictionary.fusion:
Stop it!
If I gain any more power, I...
I'll lose myself completely...
dictionary.summon:
You want to me to help you?
I guess I could...
You're a good person though, right?

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効
leader skill.name: 蒼穹の神風

bb.name: スウォールイーズ

dictionary.description: While Piany's devotion had helped to save the Vriksha Duchy from great peril, the Agni Empire sought an opportunity to attack amidst the turmoil. Unfortunately for the Agni troops, they were unaware that Piany had become a demon as they invaded her forest. Their trespassing then resulted in a battle against the demon-fairy that would ultimately repel their forces, making Piany the savior of Vriksha once again. Unbeknownst to her though, the battle had evolved her demonic form.
dictionary.evolution:
Was I wrong?
This power...
I didn't even want it...
dictionary.fusion:
Argh... Does it ever end...?
I don't need any more power...
I beg you...
dictionary.summon:
I was just fine as a mere flower...
But I just really wanted to
see that girl smile...

bb.name: スウォールクーロ

dictionary.description: A demon shaped like a flower. Piany continued fighting the Agni Empire's troops in her demonic form, until something her opponent said made her regain her composure. The great power she had gained thanks to the demon crystals had concentrated in the shape of a gorgeous flower, which gifted her with overwhelming demonic energy that could ultimately bring about her own destruction. Once Piany realized this, she made a conscious effort to calm her demonic instincts before advancing towards her enemy, who wielded a sword of fire.
dictionary.evolution:
I think I understand now...
I can't shun my power...
I must accept it
as a part of my own self...
dictionary.fusion:
You trust me, don't you?
I want to help you, but...
Please be gentle with me...
dictionary.summon:
I want to see the princess again.
But I don't think I can...
She was so beautiful and kind...
